translation.en: [Eleanor chuckles] So you’re a first-timer?
translation.zh: 你是第一次来？

translation.en: [Ted] Mm-hmm, you?
translation.zh: -你呢？-我是常客了

translation.en: A veteran. Two earlier dinner parties and a cocktail reception.
translation.zh: -你呢？-我是常客了 参加过两次晚餐派对一次鸡尾酒会

translation.en: -[Ted] And? -Difficult to describe. [sighs]
translation.zh: 感觉如何？ 很难形容

translation.en: -It’s always memorable. -[Ted] Hmm.
translation.zh: 总是令人难忘

translation.en: Eleanor Price, I’m with Reuters.
translation.zh: 我叫埃莉诺普莱斯 路透社记者

translation.en: -[Ted] Ted Parsons. -Oh! You should have said.
translation.zh: 我是泰德帕森斯 哦！你应该早说呀 祝贺你

translation.en: -[Ted] Hmm. -Congratulations.
translation.zh: 哦！你应该早说呀 祝贺你

translation.en: -Yes, indeed. -[Eleanor chuckles]
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Thank you, this is a very big night for you.
translation.zh: 谢谢 今晚对你来说可是很重要

translation.en: -No, thank you. -It is.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: [chuckles] You must be very happy.
translation.zh: 你一定非常开心吧

translation.en: -Well, I’m very relieved. -Uh-huh.
translation.zh: -我感觉松了一口气-嗯

translation.en: -And I’m grateful. -Hmm.
translation.zh: 而且心怀感恩

translation.en: -How did he do it? -I have no earthly idea.
translation.zh: 他是怎么做到的？ 我一无所知

translation.en: -[Eleanor chuckles] -How do you know Mott?
translation.zh: 你对莫特了解多少？

translation.en: Everybody in Georgetown knows Ulrich.
translation.zh: 乔治敦的每个人都认识奥立克

translation.en: He’s made himself indispensable to us at the embassy.
translation.zh: 他在大使馆是不可或缺的人物

translation.en: No, indispensable’s not the right word.
translation.zh: 不对 不该说不可或缺

translation.en: Impossible to ignore.
translation.zh: 是无法忽视

translation.en: [woman] Think Lawrence of Arabia with a Blackberry.
translation.zh: 他就像阿拉伯的劳伦斯上校不过带着黑莓手机

translation.en: The last time I was here, I sat next to Scalia.
translation.zh: 我上次来时坐在斯卡利亚大法官旁边

translation.en: He officiated at their wedding. Can you imagine?
translation.zh: 他们的婚礼竟是他主持的你能想像吗？

translation.en: -Have you met his wife? -I didn’t know he was married.
translation.zh: -你见过他妻子吗？-我都不知道他结婚了

translation.en: Oh, of course he’s married. This is her house.
translation.zh: 哦 他当然结婚了这栋房子就是他妻子的

translation.en: Where is Elsa?
translation.zh: 艾尔莎在哪？

translation.en: Invitation came through DOD. They sent me.
translation.zh: 国防部收到邀请函后就派我来了

translation.en: -Never heard of this guy. What’s his deal? -Not sure.
translation.zh: 我从没听说过这家伙他是什么来头？ 不知道 但显然是某种奇迹缔造者

translation.en: Apparently, a bit of a miracle worker.
translation.zh: 不知道 但显然是某种奇迹缔造者

translation.en: I’ve only met him a couple of times.
translation.zh: 我只见过他两次

translation.en: -Have you heard the tales from Iraq? -No.
translation.zh: -你听说过伊拉克那件事吗？-没有

translation.en: He sent us reports from the region for over two years.
translation.zh: 他在那儿给我们写了两年的报告

translation.en: Not that we’d asked for them. Most incredible shit you’ve ever seen.
translation.zh: 但并不是我们让他干的 真是难以置信

translation.en: [Ulrich] So, finally I was forced to say, "You’re mad."
translation.zh: 最后我不得不说：“你疯了吧

translation.en: "Take your ridiculous plan, stick it up your asses."
translation.zh: 你那可笑的计划老子不稀罕”

translation.en: -[crowd laugh] -Diplomatically, of course.
translation.zh: 当然是用外交口吻说的

translation.en: They said, "Ulrich, you cannot say that to the head of German intelligence."
translation.zh: 他们说：“奥立克你不能这样对德国部长这样说话”

translation.en: And I said, "I think I just did."
translation.zh: 我说：“我说完了”

translation.en: -[crowd chuckle] -I mean, come on.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: If you’re talking about, uh, planting a listening device
translation.zh: 说到放窃听器

translation.en: -in some hotel room somewhere… -[door opening]
translation.zh: 放在酒店客房之类的地方

translation.en: …in the back of some underling’s car, well, all right.
translation.zh: 或者下属的车里 都还行

translation.en: But Madeleine Albright’s master bath?
translation.zh: 但是玛德琳奥尔布赖特的主卧浴室？

translation.en: Come on! Don’t be silly.
translation.zh: 拜托 别傻了

translation.en: Uh, then, you know, I went home.
translation.zh: 然后我回到家

translation.en: Slept on it. The next day they rang and made an offer--
translation.zh: 想了一晚上 第二天他们打来电话出价…

translation.en: -How do they say? That you can’t refuse. -[crowd chuckle]
translation.zh: 有句话是怎么说的？没法拒绝的价钱

translation.en: [Eleanor] What happened?
translation.zh: 然后呢？

translation.en: [Ulrich] Well… maybe next time you’re at Madeleine Albright’s,
translation.zh: 或许下次你再去玛德琳奥尔布赖特家时

translation.en: don’t have any significant conversations in her bathroom.
translation.zh: 不要在她的浴室里说任何重要的话

translation.en: -[crowd chuckles] -[Ulrich] May I invite you?
translation.zh: 请大家入座好吗？

translation.en: [man] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -Oh, pardon me. Sorry to startle you. -You-- you didn’t.
translation.zh: 哦 对不起 吓着您了 并没有

translation.en: She often takes a nap before dinner. I’ve just come to wake her.
translation.zh: 她通常在饭前要小睡我正要叫醒她

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.zh: 失陪了

translation.en: Of course, he could always hire a caterer, but he does everything himself.
translation.zh: 当然了 他完全可以雇个厨师但他一切都要亲手做

translation.en: [woman] Oh, I know.
translation.zh: 哦 我知道

translation.en: I apologize for my late appearance. Hi.
translation.zh: 抱歉我来晚了

translation.en: -Ulrich promised he’d wake me earlier. -Is that Elsa?
translation.zh: 奥立克答应会早些叫我起床的

translation.en: -Yes. -[Ulrich] Well, I thought
translation.zh: 是她

translation.en: you needed the rest, madam.
translation.zh: 我觉得您需要休息 夫人

translation.en: -Oh, you see how he babies me? -[crowd chuckle]
translation.zh: 哦 你们都看到他是怎样照顾我的了吧？

translation.en: You know how I hate to miss the cocktails.
translation.zh: 你们知道我不喜欢错过鸡尾酒

translation.en: -[crowd chuckle] -[Ulrich] Well, we all forgive you
translation.zh: 大家都原谅你

translation.en: if you wish to make up for lost time.
translation.zh: 只要你愿意弥补错过的时间就好

translation.en: Ah. Now, before anything else…
translation.zh: 先不说别的…

translation.en: To Ulrich and his marvelous achievement.
translation.zh: 敬奥立克和他的杰出成就

translation.en: No, no, no, no. It-- I was just one of many players
translation.zh: 不 在一场复杂的球赛中

translation.en: in a very complicated game. It’s really--
translation.zh: 我只不过是众多球员中的一个 真的…

translation.en: -Oh, listen, I’m making the toast. -Oh. Sorry.
translation.zh: 听着 敬酒的人可是我 抱歉

translation.en: -[crowd chuckle] -And to a woman and her freedom.
translation.zh: 还要敬一位女士和她的自由

translation.en: And to all of you who are celebrating with us.
translation.zh: 敬在座所有与我们一起庆功的各位

translation.en: -Hear, hear. -[guests] Hear, hear.
translation.zh: 同意 -同意-干杯

translation.en: -[man 2] Cheers.
translation.zh: 干杯

translation.en: It’s very warm. Now, we’re all hungry. Fetch the soup.
translation.zh: 太热了 大家都饿了 上汤吧

translation.en: Yes, it is true. One of our staffers was arrested in Iran.
translation.zh: 没错 我们有一个员工在伊朗时被捕了

translation.en: She’s a lovely lady. Married. Daughter just started kindergarten.
translation.zh: 她是位可爱的已婚女士 女儿才刚上幼儿园

translation.en: Now, we don’t hear from her for a few days
translation.zh: 好多天没收到她的消息了

translation.en: and then the word comes back. They have grabbed her
translation.zh: 后来听到消息 她被逮捕了 说她是间谍

translation.en: and they’re holding her on espionage charges.
translation.zh: 她被逮捕了 说她是间谍

translation.en: She was a spy?
translation.zh: -她是间谍吗？-不是

translation.en: No. We’re a research shop. She’s a economist. It’s bullshit.
translation.zh: 我们是个经济组织她只是个经济学家 他们胡说的不过 国家部门是碰不得的

translation.en: Nevertheless, the State Department, you wouldn’t touch it.
translation.zh: 他们胡说的不过 国家部门是碰不得的

translation.en: You’re too busy with this transition in Iraq.
translation.zh: 伊拉克的过渡期已经很忙了

translation.en: [Ted] We couldn’t communicate with anybody over there.
translation.zh: 在那边无法跟任何人沟通

translation.en: We’re completely helpless, out of touch.
translation.zh: 彻底无助 毫无联络

translation.en: Meanwhile… [clears throat]
translation.zh: 与此同时…

translation.en: Thank you, Mott. Meanwhile, this poor woman
translation.zh: 谢谢 莫特 与此同时 这位可怜女士

translation.en: is rotting in a jail cell in Tehran.
translation.zh: 在德黑兰监狱备受煎熬

translation.en: And then a friend of mine, a former ambassador,
translation.zh: 后来 我有个朋友 曾做过大使

translation.en: refers me to our illustrious host.
translation.zh: 给我介绍了我们这位杰出的男主人

translation.en: Oh, for Christ’s sake, Ted!
translation.zh: 拜托 泰德！

translation.en: I step away for a minute, you start embarrassing me.
translation.zh: 我才走开一下 你就开始为难我

translation.en: Oh, no, Ulrich. Let him tell his story.
translation.zh: 不 奥立克 让他把故事讲完

translation.en: Well, we met and he said he’d take care of it.
translation.zh: 我们见了面 他说他会处理

translation.en: N--nah, nah, nah. I-- I said I’d look into it.
translation.zh: 不对 我是说我会了解一下

translation.en: -And? -And…
translation.zh: 然后呢？ 然后…

translation.en: ten days later, she’s released. Now, he did that.
translation.zh: 十天后 她就被释放了 是他的功劳

translation.en: -Mott did that. -[woman] How?
translation.zh: -莫特的功劳-怎么做到的？

translation.en: [Ted] He still hasn’t told me.
translation.zh: 他至今都没告诉过我

translation.en: You can’t expect a magician to give away his tricks.
translation.zh: 魔术师绝不会泄露魔术的秘密

translation.en: -[Ted chuckles] -[man] Come on. -No, no, no, no. -[man] Mr. Mott…
translation.zh: -拜托-不 莫特先生…

translation.en: No, no. Enough. Enough of that.
translation.zh: 不 够了

translation.en: -[Ulrich] Please, sit. -[Elsa] What?
translation.zh: -请坐-怎么了？

translation.en: Well, I hope she’s feeling all right.
translation.zh: 希望她没事

translation.en: I-- I can’t, I-- I just can’t. I can’t listen to any more of this.
translation.zh: 我可听不下去了

translation.en: -It’s the middle of the dinner. -I don’t care about the dinner.
translation.zh: 晚宴正进行到一半 我才不在乎什么晚宴呢

translation.en: I didn’t even know there was gonna be a dinner.
translation.zh: 我都不知道今晚有宴会

translation.en: I came here to see you, Mother.
translation.zh: 我是来看你的 母亲

translation.en: You told me you wanted to spend some time together.
translation.zh: 你说想共处一段时间

translation.en: We never get to do that anymore. And I get here and it’s all about him,
translation.zh: 但以后再也不会了 我一到这 大家都在讨论他…

translation.en: his celebration, his idiotic stories.
translation.zh: 给他庆功 还有他那些愚蠢的故事

translation.en: -He’s done a great thing. -Yeah, right.
translation.zh: 那可是丰功伟绩 对 没错

translation.en: Let me know when he wins the Nobel Prize.
translation.zh: 等他得诺贝尔奖时通知我

translation.en: -I’ll meet you in Stockholm. -That’s childish.
translation.zh: -我们斯德哥尔摩见-你太幼稚了

translation.en: After everything you’ve been through,
translation.zh: 他那样对你

translation.en: you still let him live in your house, spend your money--
translation.zh: 你却还让他住你的房子 花你的钱…

translation.en: -He's my husband. It’s our house. -Yeah, I know. I know.
translation.zh: 他是我丈夫 房子是我们两人的 对 我知道

translation.en: -[man] Mr. Mott… -[indistinct chatter]
translation.zh: 莫特先生…

translation.en: -[sighs] You’re punishing me. -[Amanda] Punishing you?
translation.zh: 你这是在惩罚我 惩罚你？

translation.en: Look, I’ll do whatever it takes, okay?
translation.zh: 听着 我愿意不惜一切代价 明白吗？

translation.en: I will move back to DC. I would-- I would do that.
translation.zh: 我愿意搬回华盛顿我…我愿意搬

translation.en: I’ll teach here, okay? You could come to Boston.
translation.zh: 我可以在这教书 明白吗？你也可以来波士顿

translation.en: I will do anything to help you
translation.zh: 我愿意做任何事来帮助你 拜托

translation.en: if you will please, please stop doing this.
translation.zh: 我愿意做任何事来帮助你 拜托 求你别再这样了

translation.en: You don’t understand. So go if you don’t want to be with us.
translation.zh: 你不明白 如果你不想陪我们 那就走吧

translation.en: Can’t you do this in the morning?
translation.zh: 明早再收拾不行吗？

translation.en: Yes, I could. I’d just like to clear some of it now.
translation.zh: 倒是可以 但我想先收拾一部分

translation.en: Yes, but then you’ll-- you'll be up until 2:00 a.m. and you’ll wake me when you come upstairs.
translation.zh: 是呀 你忙到两点上楼来会吵醒我

translation.en: I’m sorry that my clearing up after our party disturbs your rest.
translation.zh: 那还真是不好意思收拾我们的晚宴吵到你了

translation.en: [Elsa] Our party? As if anyone could get a word in.
translation.zh: “我们的”晚宴？别人都插不上话

translation.en: It’s Amanda, isn’t it? She put you in this mood.
translation.zh: 因为阿曼达吧？ 是她破坏了你的心情

translation.en: Why you invite that sour little bitch, I’ll never understand.
translation.zh: 你为何邀请那个小婊子我真不明白

translation.en: Don’t you talk about my daughter like that and don’t you dare smoke in my house.
translation.zh: 不许你这么说我的女儿 也不许你在我的房子里抽烟

translation.en: Nice beret, dude.
translation.zh: 贝雷帽真不错 伙计

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: She was fine. She ate well.
translation.zh: 她身体很好 吃得很好

translation.en: She seemed to enjoy herself.
translation.zh: 似乎很开心

translation.en: When was the last time you spoke with her?
translation.zh: 你最后一次与她讲话是什么时候？

translation.en: -Before I left the house last night. -[officer] When was this?
translation.zh: 昨晚离开家之前 什么时候？

translation.en: When she went to bed, I went for a walk sometime after midnight. [inhales deeply]
translation.zh: 大概午夜过后 她睡下后我出去散步

translation.en: I often do. She doesn’t like--
translation.zh: 我经常去散步 她不喜欢…

translation.en: Didn’t like me to smoke in the house.
translation.zh: 她生前不喜欢我在家里抽烟

translation.en: [inhales deeply] And when I returned, I found her…
translation.zh: 我一回来就发现

translation.en: on the landing.
translation.zh: 她躺在二楼

translation.en: And that’s when you called 911?
translation.zh: 你就是那时打了911？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: I called immediately. I suppose I hoped…
translation.zh: 我立即报了警 还希望…

translation.en: -How old was your wife, Mr. Mott? -[breathes heavily]
translation.zh: 莫特先生 您夫人多大年纪了？

translation.en: [Amanda] She was 91.
-[door closing] -We must all be very brave now.
translation.zh: 大家现在都要勇敢面对

translation.en: I know you left things on a somewhat sour note,
translation.zh: 我知道你们晚宴后吵过架

translation.en: -after the party. I’m terribly-- -None of that matters now.
translation.zh: 我知道你们晚宴后吵过架 -我十分…-如今都不重要了

translation.en: Do you want to discuss the arrangements?
translation.zh: 你想谈谈接下来的安排吗？

translation.en: You should know I want her to be buried in Arlington.
translation.zh: 你应该知道我想把她安葬在阿灵顿国家公墓

translation.en: -Well, I want her alongside my father. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 我想把她葬在我父亲身边 是呀

translation.en: I think Arlington would mean a great deal to her.
translation.zh: 我认为能葬在阿灵顿对她来说意义重大

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: But, o--of course, I understand completely how you feel.
translation.zh: 但当然 我也十分理解你的感受

translation.en: There are other issues.
translation.zh: 还有其他问题

translation.en: [sighs] We have to discuss
translation.zh: 我们必须讨论

translation.en: the house, my mother’s papers, and her estate.
translation.zh: 房子和我母亲的遗嘱还有她的房产

translation.en: It’s all taken care of.
translation.zh: 都有人处理好了

translation.en: I’ll be in touch very soon.
translation.zh: 我很快会再联络你

translation.en: There will be time for tears and remembrance, I promise.
translation.zh: 我们以后有时间悲伤和悼念 我保证

translation.en: But now there’s important work to be done.
translation.zh: 但目前还有更重要的事情要做

translation.en: What work?
translation.zh: 什么事？

translation.en: I must find and bring to justice
translation.zh: 你母亲 也就是我妻子是被人杀死的

translation.en: the man who killed your mother and my wife.
translation.zh: 我必须找到凶手 将其绳之以法

translation.en: [Ulrich] We are about to enter the inner sanctum, so to speak.
translation.zh: 我们即将走进 圣殿的内部 可以这么说

translation.en: The nerve center, the holy of holies. This is where information is gathered,
translation.zh: 中央枢纽 万圣归宗之地 这里是收集情报的地方

translation.en: options weighed, decisions made.
translation.zh: 权衡利弊 做出决策的地方

translation.en: Decisions that affect lives, yours, mine.
translation.zh: 那些影响生命的决策：包括你们和我

translation.en: Yes. [chuckles] Even the fate of nations.
translation.zh: 没错 甚至许多国家的命运

translation.en: No! I’m afraid I shall have to ask you to refrain from taking photographs.
translation.zh: 不行！这里禁止拍摄

translation.en: National security considerations.
translation.zh: 这是为国家安全考虑

translation.en: No, no. It’s okay. Take all the photos you like.
translation.zh: 不 没关系 随便拍照

translation.en: -Where are you folks from? -[man 1] Akron.
translation.zh: -你们是哪里人？-阿克伦

translation.en: [man 2] Cincinnati.
translation.zh: 辛辛那提州

translation.en: Look, they’re visiting their congressman’s office.
translation.zh: 听着 他们是来参观议员办公室的

translation.en: I’d expect a 50-year-old intern to know that it’s constituent service, okay?
translation.zh: 我希望50岁的实习生知道这是选区服务 好吗？

translation.en: I think inculcating an appropriate sense of the importance of the work
translation.zh: 我认为让人们知道我们工作的重要性

translation.en: we’re doing here is very much of service to the constituents.
translation.zh: 我认为让人们知道我们工作的重要性 正是选区服务的内容

translation.en: -How long you been in the US, Ulrich? -[Ulrich] Just a year.
translation.zh: 你来美国多久了 奥立克？ 刚一年

translation.en: But I’m on the accelerated track at American University.
translation.zh: 但我在美国大学的进步很快

translation.en: In fact, I’ve just been accepted into the PhD program.
translation.zh: 事实上 我已经被博士课程录取

translation.en: That’s great. I’m just wondering if maybe this job might not be the best fit.
translation.zh: 那很好 我正想着或许这份工作并不适合你

translation.en: Gordon, it is so funny you should say that.
translation.zh: 高顿 这话竟然出自你口真是有趣

translation.en: I couldn’t agree more.
translation.zh: 我非常同意

translation.en: I fear I'm miscast guiding tours or arranging tickets to the Smithsonian.
translation.zh: 在史密森尼博物馆做导游、卖票不适合我

translation.en: Diplomatic history and practice are my real passion.
translation.zh: 外交史和务实才是我真正喜爱的

translation.en: Kissinger, Bismarck, Talleyrand.
translation.zh: 基辛格、俾斯麦、塔勒朗

translation.en: What a genius, Talleyrand. Have you read him?
translation.zh: 塔勒朗这是个天才您看过他的书吧？

translation.en: Anyway, I was thinking I could put together some policy memos
translation.zh: 总之 我在想 我可以为议员撰写政策备忘录

translation.en: for the congressmen.
translation.zh: 我可以为议员撰写政策备忘录

translation.en: Talk him through some of my more complex ideas over lunch, perhaps?
translation.zh: 或许约他吃个午饭说说我的其他想法？

translation.en: No! I mean here. Here might not be the best fit.
translation.zh: 不行！我是说这里 这里不适合你

translation.en: Are you firing me, Mr. Nichols?
translation.zh: 您这是要炒我鱿鱼吗 尼克斯先生？

translation.en: I’m encouraging you to find a better place to develop your unique set of talents.
translation.zh: 我是在鼓励你去投靠更好的地方 发展你独特的才能

translation.en: -[man] Gordon? -[Gordon] Yeah.
translation.zh: -高顿？-什么事？

translation.en: [man] Can we go over the meeting schedule?
translation.zh: -来谈谈议程好吗？-好

translation.en: -Excuse me. -[phone ringing]
translation.zh: 失陪了

translation.en: Nichols. Congressman Guyer’s office. I’m his chief of staff.
translation.zh: （请出示证件！） 我叫尼克斯 担任盖尔议员的参谋长

translation.en: He’s going to have a stroke if I’m not at his table when the speeches start.
translation.zh: 如果他发言时我不在旁边他会中风的

translation.en: -Okay. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -好吧-谢谢

translation.en: [Elsa] When I spoke to him about the event,
translation.zh: 我告诉他那件事时他令我十分惊讶…

translation.en: he completely surprised me because…
translation.zh: 我告诉他那件事时他令我十分惊讶… （艾尔莎布莱特）

translation.en: -[Ulrich] Pardon me. -[Elsa] …attending… What?
translation.zh: -打扰您一下-…参加…什么？

translation.en: Oh. Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: You must be Elsa Breht, the journalist?
translation.zh: 您一定就是著名记者艾尔莎布莱特？

translation.en: -Yes. -Oh, my-- I’m Ulrich Mott. It’s an honor.
translation.zh: -我是-哦 我是奥立克莫特 幸会

translation.en: Your work is brilliant. I-- I read the Handelsblatt religiously.
translation.zh: 您的文章这是太出色了 我是《汉德尔斯布拉特报》的忠实读者

translation.en: -Oh, really? Thank you very much. -I’m working on the Hill
translation.zh: 是吗？非常感谢 我正在攻读国际关系博士学位

translation.en: while finishing a doctorate in international relations.
translation.zh: 我正在攻读国际关系博士学位 同时在《国会山报》工作

translation.en: Perhaps we could have lunch sometime?
translation.zh: 我们或许可以找个时间共进午餐？

translation.en: I believe there is a great deal I could learn from you.
translation.zh: 我一定能从您身上学到很多东西

translation.en: -Oh, well. Thank you. -Thank you.
translation.zh: 哦 谢谢抬爱 谢谢您

translation.en: Oh, pardon me.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: [Elsa] Here’s the car.
translation.zh: 车来了

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: When may I see you again?
translation.zh: 何时可以再见您？

translation.en: Well… [chuckles]
translation.zh: 这…

translation.en: -Mr. Mott, you are aware that I’m married. -Yes. So?
translation.zh: 莫特先生 你知道我是结了婚的 我知道 那又如何？

translation.en: So, um, th-- thank you for a very enjoyable lunch
translation.zh: 那么 谢谢你陪我午餐 我很开心

translation.en: and good luck to you.
translation.zh: 祝你好运

translation.en: You let me know if anything changes.
translation.zh: 如有任何变化 请通知我

translation.en: -[chuckles] -[chuckles] What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: No, I-- I don’t know. Nothing.
translation.zh: 我不知道 没什么

translation.en: You’re very amusing. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你真有趣

translation.en: [Katherine] She hasn’t answered any invitations.
translation.zh: 她一张请帖也不回

translation.en: I used to see her every week at the Symphony…
translation.zh: 以前我每周都约她去听交响乐

translation.en: but she stopped going.
translation.zh: 但她后来不去了

translation.en: -Hi, Mother. -Who’s here? I heard voices.
translation.zh: 您好 母亲 谁呀？我听到有人说话

translation.en: -Katherine. -[Elsa] [groans] The rescue party.
translation.zh: 是凯瑟琳 那个救援晚宴

translation.en: She hadn’t heard from you in weeks, she said.
translation.zh: 她说好几周没见您了

translation.en: You shouldn’t have brought her here.
translation.zh: 你应该带她过来见我

translation.en: Well, what am I supposed to do? Just stand by
translation.zh: 我该怎么做？ 站在那看着你渐渐麻木？

translation.en: -and watch you slide into apathy here? -I’m not apathetic. Don’t be ridiculous.
translation.zh: 站在那看着你渐渐麻木？ 我才不是麻木 别胡说

translation.en: I just don’t wish to be treated like an infant.
translation.zh: 只是不想让你们把我当婴儿

translation.en: Nobody’s treating you like an infant. We only--
translation.zh: 没人当你是婴儿 我们只是…

translation.en: [Katherine] Hello, darling.
translation.zh: 你好呀 亲爱的

translation.en: Now, we’re all gonna get our nails done.
translation.zh: 我们一起去做指甲

translation.en: And then Brzezinski’s giving a talk at the National Press Club at 3:00,
translation.zh: 布里辛斯基将于三点在国家记者俱乐部发表演讲

translation.en: which is right up your alley, and then dinner at La Chaumière.
translation.zh: 就在你们这条街 然后我们去法国餐厅吃晚饭

translation.en: No arguments, darling. The reservation’s already made.
translation.zh: 别跟我争 亲爱的已经预订好了

translation.en: [Amanda] Please, Mom?
translation.zh: 求你了 妈妈？

translation.en: [man on TV] Now there you have it, there you have it!
translation.zh: 时间到了

translation.en: -A New Year and a new millennium. -[phone ringing]
translation.zh: 新的一年 千禧年

translation.en: [man on TV] Finally, a day that many thought would spell the end of the world…
translation.zh: 被许多人认定是世界末日的这一天终于来临了…

translation.en: Yes?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: [Ulrich over phone] Truly an historic day.
translation.zh: 真是富有历史意义的一天呀

translation.en: Hmm? What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: [Ulrich over phone] Well, surely, you’re watching.
translation.zh: 您肯定正在收看

translation.en: -[Elsa] Who’s this? -[Ulrich over phone] Ulrich Mott.
translation.zh: -你是谁？-奥立克莫特

translation.en: I took you for schnitzel. Oh, get to the point, Ulrich.
translation.zh: 我带您去吃过德式猪排 直截了当吧 奥立克

translation.en: Mozart, Schumann, Berlin Philharmonic at the Kennedy Center Wednesday night.
translation.zh: 莫扎特、舒曼、柏林爱乐乐团 周三晚在肯尼迪音乐厅

translation.en: It’s completely sold out, but I obtained two tickets.
translation.zh: 票已经售罄 但我弄到了两张

translation.en: -Don’t ask me how. I won’t tell you. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 别问我是怎么弄到的 我不会告诉你

translation.en: Call me in an hour.
translation.zh: 一个小时后打给我

translation.en: [man on TV] It is a new millennium. The future is now here…
translation.zh: 千禧之年 未来就在眼前…

translation.en: [man] Your mother never ceases to amaze.
translation.zh: 你母亲永远那么迷人

translation.en: -I hope I look half as good at her age. -Me too. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 希望我到了她这个年纪能及她一半就够了 -我也这么想-帮您倒酒好吗？

translation.en: -May I? -[indistinct chatter]
translation.zh: -我也这么想-帮您倒酒好吗？

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: And suddenly, the ascendant queen of Georgetown society.
translation.zh: 她突然成了乔治敦圈内的女王

translation.en: She’s been holding a party a week, it seems.
translation.zh: 似乎每周都办一场宴会

translation.en: Watch out, Sally Quinn!
translation.zh: 当心 莎莉奎因！

translation.en: -What’s her secret? -If you find out, let me know.
translation.zh: 她有什么秘诀吗？ 等你知道了告诉我

translation.en: [man] Oh, your father would be so glad to see it.
translation.zh: 哦 你父亲看到一定很开心

translation.en: [Elsa] Darling, there’s something I need to discuss with you.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我有件事要跟你谈谈

translation.en: Now, you remember the time
translation.zh: 还记得你说过

translation.en: when you said you felt that I needed some companionship
translation.zh: 还记得你说过 你认为我应该找个伴

translation.en: and I was too dismissive at the time and I apologize because you were right.
translation.zh: 当时我不屑一顾 我为此道歉 因为你说得对

translation.en: Well. Uh… [chuckles]
translation.zh: 这…

translation.en: Well, I have something I need to tell you too.
translation.zh: 那我也有件事要告诉你

translation.en: I got the position. At Harvard.
translation.zh: 我找到工作了 是哈佛大学

translation.en: Oh, that’s wonderful.
translation.zh: 哦 那真是太好了

translation.en: Full professorship and tenure. They just sent the formal offer.
translation.zh: 终身教授职位正式聘书已经寄来了

translation.en: -Tremendous! That’s marvelous! -Yes!
translation.zh: 太棒啦！真是天大的好消息！

translation.en: Oh, but… well, they don’t know how lucky they are.
translation.zh: 是呀！ 他们还不知道自己有多幸运

translation.en: -And it’s all arranged? -Well, I have to--
translation.zh: -都安排好了？-这个嘛 我必须…

translation.en: -No, no, no, no. No, you take it. -I wanted to discuss it with you.
translation.zh: -不行 你得去-我想跟你谈谈

translation.en: Shh, you take it. That’s all there is to it.
translation.zh: 你必须去 就这么说定了

translation.en: -Well-- -Oh, that’s marvelous.
translation.zh: -这…-真是太棒了

translation.en: And maybe you’ll meet someone there, darling.
translation.zh: 或许你在那还能找到对象呢

translation.en: [chuckles] Yes, I’m not particularly focused
translation.zh: 我目前并不想找

translation.en: -on that right now. -No, I know things have been -very disappointing for you in that arena. -[Amanda chuckles]
translation.zh: 我知道你这方面一直很令人失望

translation.en: Mom, can we not?
translation.zh: 妈 别说了好吗？

translation.en: Look, I-- I thought maybe you’d consider going with me.
translation.zh: 我想或许你会考虑跟我搬过去

translation.en: Now I know how attached you are to Georgetown,
translation.zh: 我知道你对乔治敦深有感情

translation.en: but it would be so much easier to help you out there.
translation.zh: 但在那边照顾你方便很多

translation.en: Oh, darling. [chuckles] I don’t need help.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我不需要帮助

translation.en: -No. But I thought you just said you wa-- -I have everything I need here.
translation.zh: 但你不是说… 我在这里什么都不缺

translation.en: -[glass clinking] -What?
translation.zh: -什么？-过来

translation.en: -Come on. -[Ulrich] Good afternoon, my friends.
translation.zh: 午安 各位朋友

translation.en: I wish to make an announcement.
translation.zh: 我有件事要宣布

translation.en: There is an ulterior motive for our little party today.
translation.zh: 今日聚会是有目的

translation.en: W--we didn’t want to make a big thing of it,
translation.zh: 我们不想太高调

translation.en: but we also wanted to share our joy with you.
translation.zh: 但也想与大家分享喜悦

translation.en: So please raise your glasses with me
translation.zh: 因此 请大家举杯

translation.en: as I celebrate my great good fortune in becoming engaged to marry
translation.zh: 我十分荣幸

translation.en: the extraordinary, the dazzling, Mrs. Elsa Breht.
translation.zh: 与美丽又杰出的艾尔莎布莱特女士订婚

translation.en: -[man] Hear, hear! -[woman] Cheers!
translation.zh: -恭喜！-干杯！

translation.en: [Amanda] How long have you known him?
translation.zh: 你认识他多久了？

translation.en: Lower your voice.
translation.zh: 小点儿声

translation.en: And I don’t appreciate being spoken to
translation.zh: 别用这种语气跟我说话

translation.en: like a virgin teenager from some convent school.
translation.zh: 好像我是个修道院处女似的

translation.en: You know, he looks like he could be my brother.
translation.zh: 要知道 他看上去跟我差不多大

translation.en: It’s not like you don’t have any choice. You must have other suitors.
translation.zh: 又不是没有好的人选 肯定有别人追求你

translation.en: They’re old and boring. Mott is young and interesting.
translation.zh: 其他人又老又闷莫特既年轻又风趣

translation.en: I think he has enormous potential.
translation.zh: 我认为他很有潜力

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Can we just stop, please? Playing these games. All right?
translation.zh: 别这样 求你了 别再耍这种把戏了 好吗？

translation.en: This is me.
translation.zh: 你面对的只是我

translation.en: All right? Your only daughter, Amanda.
translation.zh: 明白吗？你的独生女 阿曼达

translation.en: -Do you know anything about him? -Amanda, I don’t need your approval.
translation.zh: 你对他了解多少？ 阿曼达 我不需要等你批准

translation.en: I managed to survive the war.
translation.zh: 我熬过二战

translation.en: I managed to come to this country, and learn English,
translation.zh: 来到这个国家 学会了英语

translation.en: and raise a baby, and have a career.
translation.zh: 养大了一个孩子建立了自己的事业

translation.en: So I think I can manage to marry… [chuckles]
translation.zh: 所以我认为自己有能力

translation.en: …a very fascinating and devoted and yes, somewhat younger man.
translation.zh: 嫁给一个迷人又忠诚的男人 而且 没错 他是比我年轻

translation.en: [exhales sharply] Oh, thank you. Thank you, Grant.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 格兰特

translation.en: I just want him out of my house. I want him out of there now.
translation.zh: 我想让他搬出我的房子马上就搬

translation.en: -Miss Breht, let me explain. -Detective, I teach constitutional law.
translation.zh: 布莱特小姐 请容我解释 警探 我是教宪法的

translation.en: So please just remove the layer of condescension from your voice.
translation.zh: 所以拜托你别当我什么也不懂

translation.en: Explain to me why you’ve left a probable suspect alone,
translation.zh: 你给我解释为什么允许一个可疑的嫌犯

translation.en: at liberty, in an active crime scene?
translation.zh: 在犯罪现场自由出入？

translation.en: This is not a criminal investigation, ma’am.
translation.zh: 这不是刑事犯罪调查 夫人

translation.en: And as of now, all we have is a deceased 90-year-old woman
translation.zh: 只是有位90岁老妇人去世而已

translation.en: and a grieving spouse,
translation.zh: 她丈夫正处在悲痛中

translation.en: who we intend to interview first thing tomorrow morning.
translation.zh: 我们打算明天一大早就找他谈

translation.en: And what about the ME? Have they established the cause of death?
translation.zh: 那尸检结果呢？找到死因了吗？

translation.en: Your mother had a head injury, likely due to falling on the stairs.
translation.zh: 您母亲是头部受伤而亡很可能是从楼梯跌下来造成的

translation.en: -You don’t know that. -No, we don’t.
translation.zh: 你们并不知道是否如此 对 我们不知道

translation.en: Which is why we’ll be waiting for a full autopsy, ma’am.
translation.zh: 所以我们在等正式尸检 夫人

translation.en: Shouldn’t take any more than a couple of days.
translation.zh: 不超过两天就会有结果

translation.en: Mr. Mott, I want to remind you again, you may have an attorney present.
translation.zh: 莫特先生 我们想再次提醒您您有权要求律师在场

translation.en: I’m fully aware of that and I don’t require any attorney.
translation.zh: 我非常清楚我不需要请律师

translation.en: Good. I want to go over what happened
translation.zh: 那好 我想知道您发现妻子的尸体后做了什么

translation.en: after you first discovered your wife’s body.
translation.zh: 我想知道您发现妻子的尸体后做了什么

translation.en: [inhales deeply] I was coming home, expecting her to be asleep in her room.
translation.zh: 我回到家 以为她在睡觉

translation.en: I didn’t expect to see her at all until the morning.
translation.zh: 要到早上才会见到她

translation.en: So, of course,
translation.zh: 所以 当然

translation.en: I was deeply in shock when I saw her there.
translation.zh: 我见到她躺在那儿大吃一惊

translation.en: -You had separate rooms? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 你们分房睡？ -对-为什么？

translation.en: -Why is that? -She was 91 years old, Detective.
translation.zh: -对-为什么？ 她已经91岁了 警探

translation.en: Have you ever had conjugal relations with a woman in her early 90s?
translation.zh: 您听说过谁会跟90岁出头的女人行房？

translation.en: -No. -Neither have I.
translation.zh: -没听说过-我也是

translation.en: Did you touch your wife’s body at any point after you discovered her?
translation.zh: 你发现妻子尸体后碰过她吗？

translation.en: I may-- Yes, I may have touched her briefly
translation.zh: 我…是的 我可能稍微碰过

translation.en: to-- to check for a pulse or something.
translation.zh: 看看她的脉搏之类的

translation.en: [sighs] May I say something at this point?
translation.zh: -我能说两句吗？-请讲

translation.en: -Please. -As I told you before,
translation.zh: -我能说两句吗？-请讲 我告诉过你们 我妻子睡下后

translation.en: I was out for a portion of the evening after my wife went to bed.
translation.zh: 我告诉过你们 我妻子睡下后 我出去了一会儿

translation.en: I was away from the house for several hours.
translation.zh: 我有几个小时都不在家

translation.en: -Where did you go? -For a walk.
translation.zh: -你去了哪里？-散步

translation.en: For several hours?
translation.zh: 散了几个小时步？

translation.en: I have very little time for exercise during the day
translation.zh: 我白天没什么时间锻炼

translation.en: and after a heavy meal, I find it’s a necessity.
translation.zh: 晚上吃了一大餐我觉得有必要走走

translation.en: The point, gentlemen, is this.
translation.zh: 先生们 重点是

translation.en: It seems very likely to me that it was during this period between…
translation.zh: 在我看来 当晚那段时间 大概晚上11点至凌晨2点

translation.en: uh, approximately 11:00 and two o'clock in the morning
translation.zh: 大概晚上11点至凌晨2点

translation.en: that someone broke in and murdered my wife.
translation.zh: 很可能有人闯进我家谋杀了我妻子

translation.en: Mr. Mott, there was no evidence of any break-in.
translation.zh: 莫特先生 并没有证据表明有人闯入你家

translation.en: No, there wouldn’t be, would there?
translation.zh: -是呀 当然不会有-我不明白

translation.en: -I don’t understand. -No, you clearly don’t.
translation.zh: -是呀 当然不会有-我不明白 你当然不明白你们都不知道自己办的什么案

translation.en: You don’t understand what you’re dealing with at all.
translation.zh: 你当然不明白你们都不知道自己办的什么案

translation.en: -What do you mean, Mr. Mott? -[Ulrich] I mean…
translation.zh: -此话怎讲 莫特先生？-我是说…

translation.en: Frankly, I can’t believe I have to spell this out for you.
translation.zh: 真难以置信 连这都得解释

translation.en: [sighs] That the sort of people capable of committing this crime
translation.zh: 能犯下这种罪行的人

translation.en: would be far too sophisticated to leave convenient clues
translation.zh: 肯定非常狡猾绝不会留下任何蛛丝马迹

translation.en: for the likes of the DC police to stumble over.
translation.zh: 等着让你们这些警察发现

translation.en: Mr. Mott, do you know what this is?
translation.zh: 莫特先生 你知道这是什么吗？

translation.en: -It is a criminal complaint. -[Grant] That’s right.
translation.zh: 是刑事诉讼令 没错

translation.en: A complaint your wife filed against you for assault.
translation.zh: 您妻子状告您家暴

translation.en: Is there anything you’d like to tell us about this?
translation.zh: 对此您有什么想说的吗？

translation.en: This refers to an incident that occurred in New York City some time ago.
translation.zh: 这是很久以前在纽约发生的事

translation.en: That there was an argument between my wife and I.
translation.zh: 我与妻子发生了争执

translation.en: That, while deeply painful and embarrassing,
translation.zh: 虽然非常痛苦又丢脸

translation.en: it was not atypical of the sorts of dispute
translation.zh: 但是易怒的老夫老妻之间

translation.en: that arise between passionate and long-married people.
translation.zh: 通常都会发生类似的争执

translation.en: That it precipitated a break in our marriage,
translation.zh: 那件事造成了我们婚姻的裂痕

translation.en: that was mended to our great mutual happiness
translation.zh: 原本我们在痛苦地分开了两年之后

translation.en: after two very difficult years apart.
translation.zh: 为了大家的幸福 已经和好了

translation.en: Well…
translation.zh: 那么…

translation.en: given this history and given the fact there was no evidence of any intruder…
translation.zh: 鉴于这些事件以及并没有外人侵入的证据…

translation.en: We’re declaring this a homicide investigation.
translation.zh: 此案会以谋杀案进行调查

translation.en: Ah. I see.
translation.zh: 我明白了

translation.en: And am I under arrest?
translation.zh: 这么说 我被捕了吗？

translation.en: Not at the present time.
translation.zh: 目前还没有

translation.en: However, we have obtained a warrant ordering your house sealed
translation.zh: 不过 我们已经获得搜查令查封您家的房子

translation.en: -pending further forensic investigation. -[Koteras] You can’t go back there.
translation.zh: 等待法庭的调查 您不能再回去了

translation.en: [Grant] And we’re instructing you not to leave the DC area.
translation.zh: 并且我们要求您不得离开华盛顿

translation.en: It’s Ulrich Mott. Can you meet? It’s urgent.
translation.zh: 我是奥立克莫特能见一面吗？有急事

translation.en: [David] Mr. Mott.
translation.zh: 莫特先生

translation.en: [Ulrich] Thank you so much for meeting me.
translation.zh: -非常感谢您肯见我-不客气

translation.en: -[David] Of course. -[Ulrich] Yeah, but let’s walk, shall we?
translation.zh: -非常感谢您肯见我-不客气 我们去走走吧 好吗？

translation.en: [David] We heard about Elsa on the news.
translation.zh: 我们从新闻得知艾尔莎去世

translation.en: Terrible shock. I’m so sorry for your loss.
translation.zh: 大受打击 为您感到遗憾

translation.en: [Ulrich] It’s a very difficult time and I fear it’s only going to get worse.
translation.zh: 真是非常艰难 恐怕还会越来越糟

translation.en: -[siren wailing] -[David] What do you mean?
translation.zh: 此话怎讲？

translation.en: -I-- I hope only a few days, but, um… -[knock on door]
translation.zh: 希望几天就够 但是…

translation.en: The coroner’s report’s due about 11:00. I should know more then.
translation.zh: 尸检报告11点出 到时会有更多消息

translation.en: [Amanda] Oh, thank you.
translation.zh: 哦 谢谢

translation.en: [man] This came for you at the front desk.
translation.zh: -前台收到您的信件-好 谢谢

translation.en: -Yeah, thanks. -[man] Okay.
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: Yeah, believe me, I don’t wanna stay in DC another moment longer than I have to.
translation.zh: 相信我 这里我一刻也不想多待

translation.en: Thanks. I really appreciate it. Okay.
translation.zh: 谢谢 真的很感激您 好的

translation.en: She left him 250,000 dollars. Plus, an additional 50
translation.zh: 她给他留了二十五万美金遗产 另外 如果可变现资产超过六十万他还会多分五万

translation.en: if her liquid assets exceed 600,000 dollars.
translation.zh: 另外 如果可变现资产超过六十万他还会多分五万

translation.en: Liquid assets. I assume that means the house,
translation.zh: 可变现资产指的是这栋房子吧

translation.en: which has got to be worth, what? Close to a million.
translation.zh: 价值肯定有差不多…一百万美金

translation.en: -Probably more. -And he gets that too?
translation.zh: 可能值更多 而且房子也是他的？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 您好

translation.en: [chuckles] No problem, Detective. No, no, no. We appreciate it.
translation.zh: 没问题 警探 不 我们很感激

translation.en: I see.
translation.zh: 我知道了

translation.en: No. I’ll tell her right now.
translation.zh: 不用 我现在就告诉她

translation.en: -All right. Thank you very much. -[phone beeps]
translation.zh: 好的 非常感谢

translation.en: The ME has determined Elsa suffered injuries
translation.zh: 法医判定艾尔莎的伤

translation.en: consistent with blunt force trauma.
translation.zh: 属于钝器外伤

translation.en: They’re opening a homicide investigation.
translation.zh: 他们已经当作谋杀案展开调查了

translation.en: -Where is he? -Ma’am? I'm sorry--
translation.zh: -他人呢？-女士…

translation.en: That son of a bitch. He killed her.
translation.zh: 是那个混蛋杀了她

translation.en: -Okay, ma’am, if you could just-- -Don’t touch me!
translation.zh: -女士 如果你…-别碰我！

translation.en: -[officer] Hang on. Ma’am, calm down. -Don’t tell me to calm down.
translation.zh: 等一下 女士 请冷静 别叫我冷静

translation.en: [officer] There’s no one here right now. Do you have any idea where Mott might be?
translation.zh: 现在屋里没人你知道莫特会去哪吗？

translation.en: How should I know? He might have fled the country by now.
translation.zh: 我怎么会知道？他可能已经畏罪潜逃了

translation.en: You’ve got to put a hold on his passport.
translation.zh: 你们应该没收他的护照

translation.en: [officer] Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa. Hold on.
translation.zh: 喂 等一下

translation.en: -Are you Ulrich Mott? -Yes.
translation.zh: -你是奥立克莫特吗？-我是

translation.en: [officer] You have the right to remain silent.
translation.zh: 你有权保持沉默

translation.en: Anything you say can and will be used against you
translation.zh: 你所说的每一句话都将成为法庭上的证词

translation.en: in a court of law. You have the right to an attorney.
translation.zh: 你所说的每一句话都将成为法庭上的证词 你有权聘请律师

translation.en: If you cannot afford an attorney, one will be provided.
translation.zh: 如果无法负担律师费法庭会指派一个律师给你

translation.en: The mail just came. And here’s my latest acquisition.
translation.zh: 信送来了 这个玩意儿是我新买的

translation.en: -Ho, ho, ho! Oh, Bravo! -[Ulrich chuckles]
translation.zh: 真精彩！

translation.en: Most ingenious thing I’ve ever seen.
translation.zh: 真是我所见过最好笑的事了

translation.en: -[woman] Oh. -[Elsa] Goodbye, dear.
translation.zh: 再见 亲爱的

translation.en: So we’ll see you Sunday at the Scowcroft’s?
translation.zh: 周日在斯科夫克罗夫特家见

translation.en: Go fetch the car.
translation.zh: 去把车开过来

translation.en: He’s very charming.
translation.zh: 他这人真不错

translation.en: Isn’t he?
translation.zh: 谁说不是呢？

translation.en: Have I done something wrong?
translation.zh: 我做错什么了吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: It’s all perfect.
translation.zh: 一切都很完美

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: You are the perfect butler.
translation.zh: 你是个完美的管家

translation.en: Is that all you want to be?
translation.zh: 这就是你想要的吗？

translation.en: You know it isn’t.
translation.zh: 你知道不是的

translation.en: So what are you waiting for?
translation.zh: 那你还在等什么？

translation.en: -An opportunity. I’m trying. -[Elsa] Are you?
translation.zh: 等待机遇 我正在努力 是吗？

translation.en: Am I the opportunity?
translation.zh: 我就是你的机遇吗？

translation.en: You’re my wife.
translation.zh: 你是我的妻子

translation.en: Vladimir Petrovsky.
translation.zh: 弗拉基米尔·彼得罗夫斯基

translation.en: He’s a very dear old friend.
translation.zh: 他是我的老友

translation.en: A diplomat in the Soviet era
translation.zh: 是苏联时期的外交家

translation.en: and now he works in the United Nations in Geneva.
translation.zh: 现在他在日内瓦联合国工作

translation.en: We make our opportunities.
translation.zh: 机遇是自己创造的

translation.en: [Ulrich] Mr. Petrovsky?
translation.zh: 彼得罗夫斯基先生？

translation.en: I believe we have a mutual friend, Elsa Breht.
translation.zh: 我们有一位共同的朋友 艾尔莎布莱特

translation.en: Uh-- um. No. She sends her best.
translation.zh: 不是 她向您问好

translation.en: Certainly, I-- I will tell her.
translation.zh: 我一定会转告她

translation.en: The reason for my call… y--you see, um…
translation.zh: 我之所以打这个电话…

translation.en: I-- I was just thinking…
translation.zh: 是因为…

translation.en: I was wondering…
translation.zh: 我不知道…

translation.en: I-- I recently left my position on the Hill…
translation.zh: 我最近辞掉了《国会山报》的工作…

translation.en: I was leading study groups for members of Congress in foreign relations,
translation.zh: 我带领研究团队为国会议员们做国际关系研究…

translation.en: uh-- to form my own company, my… consulting firm.
translation.zh: 成立我自己的公司…顾问公司

translation.en: M--my interpersonal services and consulting firm.
translation.zh: 交际与顾问服务公司

translation.en: Um, we are now a second year of operation
translation.zh: 已经运营两年

translation.en: a--and we have a number of clients, like yourself,
translation.zh: 有很多像您这样的客户

translation.en: who are looking for an informal kind of representative in Washington
translation.zh: 想在华盛顿聘请非正式代言人

translation.en: on an ad hoc basis. Yeah.
translation.zh: 执行临时任务 对

translation.en: Well, if-- if there’s a conference, a meeting,
translation.zh: 如果有某个会议 某次面谈

translation.en: maybe even a party that you might have an interest in
translation.zh: 甚至包括您可能感兴趣的宴会

translation.en: but are unable to be in attendance
translation.zh: 但却无法出席

translation.en: and we are your Washington eyes and ears, so to say.
translation.zh: 我们就是您在华盛顿的耳目 可以这么说

translation.en: Yes? [chuckles] Indeed.
translation.zh: 是吗？ 的确如此

translation.en: It’s remarkable that no one’s ever thought of it before, but…
translation.zh: 你是说以前怎么没人想出这个主意 但…

translation.en: Ulrich Mott and Associates. Let me give you my private number.
translation.zh: 奥立克莫特联合公司 我给您留个私人电话吧

translation.en: There’s no need for you to go through my secretary.
translation.zh: 您不需要通过我的秘书

translation.en: Can I just interrupt the conversation?
translation.zh: 我能直接插话吗？

translation.en: -[Elsa] Yes, of course. -[Ulrich] Okay.
translation.zh: 当然可以 好吧

translation.en: -[dramatic music playing] -On the left.
translation.zh: 去吧

translation.en: [Ulrich] Pardon me. Ulrich Mott,
translation.zh: 打扰您一下 我是奥立克莫特

translation.en: representing Vladimir Petrovsky, the UN in Geneva.
translation.zh: 代表日内瓦联合国的弗拉基米尔彼得罗夫斯基

translation.en: Mr. Petrovsky sends his regrets at not being able to attend today.
translation.zh: 彼得罗夫斯基先生未能到场 他对此表示遗憾

translation.en: With your kind permission, I will read his remarks
translation.zh: 请容我在此宣读他的评论

translation.en: and after, answer any questions you may have.
translation.zh: 然后回答各位提出的问题

translation.en: Y--you should speak to my husband about that.
translation.zh: 你应该找我的丈夫谈谈

translation.en: That’s exactly what Mott and Associates was set up to handle.
translation.zh: 莫特联合公司正是为此成立的

translation.en: May, uh… leave my card with you? Please, feel free…
translation.zh: 我…可以给您留张名片吗？ 请您随时…

translation.en: [Elsa] Ulrich Mott and Associates. No, I don’t like it.
translation.zh: “奥立克莫特联合公司”我不喜欢这个名字

translation.en: International… Solutions Symposium, you know?
translation.zh: 国际… 解决方案研讨会 你说呢？

translation.en: -Oh, keep it short. Keep it short. -Global Solution Group?
translation.zh: 别太长 环球咨询小组？

translation.en: -Prominent Persons Group? -No. No, no, no… Near-- near, um…
translation.zh: 杰出人士集团？ 不好 不好…但是差不多了

translation.en: T… Eminent Persons Group. Eminent Persons Group.
translation.zh: 知名人士小组 知名人士小组

translation.en: So she has-- Oh, there she is.
translation.zh: 这么说 她有…她来了

translation.en: Oh, he is so sweet! He’s very intelligent.
translation.zh: 他真是太贴心了 他很有智慧

translation.en: Yes. Well, I assume so.
translation.zh: 对 我想应该是

translation.en: If only one can have grandchildren. I don’t have…
translation.zh: 能有孙辈就好了 我没有…

translation.en: He’s with the Defense Threat Reduction Agency.
translation.zh: 他是国防部威胁降低管理局的人

translation.en: Excellent contact. Could be very valuable to us.
translation.zh: 关系很硬 对我们很有价值

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: [judge] All right. This is a preliminary detention hearing
translation.zh: 本次是首次听证会

translation.en: in the case of United States VS Ulrich Gero Mott…
translation.zh: 联邦政府对奥立克莫特案…

translation.en: [clears throat] Your Honor, there are a few issues
translation.zh: 法官大人 有几个问题

translation.en: that Mr. Mott would like to raise before the court.
translation.zh: 莫特先生想在开庭前做陈述

translation.en: -What sort of issues? -Mr. Mott hasn’t told me in detail.
translation.zh: 什么问题？ 莫特先生并没有详细告诉我

translation.en: He made it clear he’d like to be heard on this as opposed to me, so…
translation.zh: 他明确表示希望亲口陈述而不是由我代言 所以…

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 那好吧

translation.en: Thank you, Your Honor, and good morning.
translation.zh: 谢谢法官大人 早安

translation.en: -Good morning. -[Ulrich] I wish to lodge
translation.zh: 早安 我想提出以下申述

translation.en: the following complaints.
translation.zh: 我想提出以下申述

translation.en: The United States is in open violation of my rights under the Geneva Convention.
translation.zh: 联邦政府公开侵犯 我依据《日内瓦公约》所享有的权利

translation.en: I am, and remain, a serving officer in a foreign army
translation.zh: 我仍是外国军队在职军官

translation.en: and as such am entitled to my uniform and insignia,
translation.zh: 因此我有权穿军装并佩戴肩章

translation.en: as well as to be addressed by my full rank,
translation.zh: 并有权使用军衔全称

translation.en: Brigadier General Ulrich Mott.
translation.zh: 奥立克莫特准将

translation.en: -[gentle music playing] -I’m sorry, did you say brigadier general?
translation.zh: 抱歉 您是说准将？

translation.en: That is correct.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: [judge] In the United States Army?
translation.zh: 是美国军队吗？

translation.en: No. The Iraqi Special Forces.
translation.zh: 不 是伊拉克别动队

translation.en: Well, as regards the legal issues you raise,
translation.zh: 就你所提出的法律问题

translation.en: I’ll ask the government to look into them and respond.
translation.zh: 我将请求政府核实并回应

translation.en: All right?
translation.zh: 可以吗？

translation.en: -Are we ready to proceed? -[Volker] Yes, Your Honor.
translation.zh: 可以开庭了吗？ 是的 法官大人

translation.en: Could you get us some documentation on that?
translation.zh: 能提供文件吗？

translation.en: The court’s gonna want to see it.
translation.zh: 法官想看看

translation.en: -Proof of my rank, you mean? -[Durant] Yeah.
translation.zh: 你是指我的军衔？ 对呀

translation.en: Well, of course. That goes without saying. I can arrange it immediately.
translation.zh: 当然了 不必说 我马上就能安排

translation.en: Mr. Mott, it would have been helpful
translation.zh: 莫特先生

translation.en: if you had told us ahead of time about your military…
translation.zh: 如果您能一早告诉我们您在军中的…

translation.en: affiliation, or whatever you choose to call it.
translation.zh: 关系 或者你想用什么词都好

translation.en: Tell me…
translation.zh: 你告诉我…

translation.en: why is it my job to do your due diligence?
translation.zh: 你的职责为什么要我帮你做？

translation.en: I didn’t ask for you to represent me.
translation.zh: 又不是我请你帮我辩护的

translation.en: And I can’t say I’m particularly impressed so far
translation.zh: 我是否服役这么基本的事

translation.en: if something as basic as my military service takes you by surprise.
translation.zh: 你都觉得惊讶 我真的很失望

translation.en: I’ve been active in the international community
translation.zh: 这么多年来 我在EPG一直与国际社会保持紧密联系

translation.en: -for years through the EPG. -The EPG?
translation.zh: 这么多年来 我在EPG一直与国际社会保持紧密联系 EPG？

translation.en: The Eminent Persons Group, my NGO.
translation.zh: 知名人士小组 我成立的NGO

translation.en: -Non-governmental organization. -Right, got it.
translation.zh: 非政府组织 好吧 明白了

translation.en: Is there anything else that we should know going forward that you haven’t told us?
translation.zh: 您还有什么没告诉我们？

translation.en: Absolutely not.
translation.zh: 显然没有了

translation.en: I have at every stage been completely candid.
translation.zh: 我对人生每个阶段都坦白交代了

translation.en: I was candid with the police when I was told I was a suspect.
translation.zh: 警察说我是嫌疑犯时我也很坦率

translation.en: I surrendered myself willingly when they came to my home
translation.zh: 他们来我家时我也主动投降了

translation.en: to arrest me for a brutal and sickening crime
translation.zh: 说我犯下残酷且令人作呕的罪行

translation.en: because I am innocent of that crime.
translation.zh: 因为我是无辜的

translation.en: Why did you leave the house on the night of your wife’s death?
translation.zh: 您妻子离世的当晚您为何离开家？

translation.en: I went for a walk.
translation.zh: 我出去散步

translation.en: Yes. Why?
translation.zh: 对 但是为什么？

translation.en: Why do people go for walks?
translation.zh: 人为什么散步？

translation.en: For fresh air, for exercise, to smoke a cigar.
translation.zh: 为了透透气 为了锻炼身体 为了抽支雪茄

translation.en: Because I’d been sitting at a dinner table all night long.
translation.zh: 因为我在餐桌旁坐了一整晚

translation.en: Because it’s my regular habit.
translation.zh: 因为我就是有这个习惯还想听别的吗？

translation.en: -Shall I go on? -Mr. Mott, where did you go?
translation.zh: 莫特先生 您去了哪里？

translation.en: Around the neighborhood.
translation.zh: 就在家附近

translation.en: And is there anyone who can corroborate this?
translation.zh: 有人能作证吗？

translation.en: If you find a pedestrian who took note
translation.zh: 如果你能找到一个行人

translation.en: of a perfectly ordinary man taking a perfectly ordinary stroll,
translation.zh: 注意到一个平凡无奇的人在随意散步

translation.en: then yes, they can corroborate. Otherwise, you and the DC Superior Court
translation.zh: 那么当然那人可以作证 否则 你和华盛顿高级法院

translation.en: will somehow have to acquaint yourselves with the concept of a man taking a walk.
translation.zh: 就必须熟悉一下什么叫做散步

translation.en: That is our mission. Thank you.
translation.zh: 这就是我们的使命 谢谢

translation.en: [Michel] It is absolutely imperative to continue
translation.zh: 继续让所有人都达成一致

translation.en: to get absolutely everybody on board.
translation.zh: 显然是十分迫切的

translation.en: -Sorry. -Monsieur le Premier Ministre.
translation.zh: 抱歉 总理先生

translation.en: Excusez-moi.
translation.zh: 不好意思

translation.en: [in French] What can I do for you?
translation.zh: 需要我帮忙吗？

translation.en: [in English] I was extraordinarily impressed by your remarks.
translation.zh: 您的发言令我印象十分深刻

translation.en: Particularly your emphasis on reform of the UN Security Council.
translation.zh: 尤其是您强调需要改革联合国安理会

translation.en: You are absolutely right. It could not be more essential,
translation.zh: 您说得太对了 真是太关键了

translation.en: especially for those of us who care about nonproliferation.
translation.zh: 尤其是对我们这些关注防止核扩散的人来说

translation.en: -Thank you very much, Mr… -Mott. Ulrich Mott.
translation.zh: 非常感谢 您是… 莫特 奥立克莫特

translation.en: I am with the Eminent Persons Group.
translation.zh: 我是知名人士小组的

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: You know, w--we’re becoming increasingly involved in counterterrorism issues, uh…
translation.zh: 我们越来越多地参与反恐问题

translation.en: and perhaps sometime we could discuss some areas
translation.zh: 或许我们能找个时间

translation.en: where we might work together?
translation.zh: 讨论一下合作的空间？

translation.en: -Perhaps. -Are you free for lunch next week?
translation.zh: 或许吧 您下周有时间吃个午饭吗？

translation.en: Uh, the embassy keeps my schedule while I’m in the States. I really don’t--
translation.zh: 我在美国的行程都是大使馆安排好的我真的没…

translation.en: -Let me give you my card. -Call the embassy.
translation.zh: 我在美国的行程都是大使馆安排好的我真的没… -请收下我的名片-你打给大使馆吧

translation.en: [Michel] I’m so sorry. As I mentioned…
translation.zh: 很抱歉 正如我所提到…

translation.en: Yes. Monsieur Michel Rocard, please. Ulrich Mott from the Eminent Persons Group.
translation.zh: 对 我找米歇尔罗卡德先生我是知名人士小组的奥立克莫特

translation.en: -Ulrich Mott! -[dramatic music playing]
translation.zh: 奥立克莫特！

translation.en: Yeah, I-- I’d like to discuss that personally with Monsieur Ro--
translation.zh: 对 这一点我想与他本人谈…

translation.en: Well, we’re good friends.
translation.zh: 我们是好朋友

translation.en: He asked me to call and arrange for lunch. Is he in?
translation.zh: 是他让我打来约他午餐 他在吗？

translation.en: I think it would be best if I spoke directly--
translation.zh: 最好能直接与他本人…

translation.en: Well, all right. I’ll leave my number.
translation.zh: 那好吧 我留个电话号码

translation.en: [Ulrich] Where did you live when you first came to America?
translation.zh: 你刚来美国时住哪？

translation.en: -What was it like? -In Nebraska?
translation.zh: 那是个什么地方？ 内布拉斯加？

translation.en: All of it.
translation.zh: 所有地方

translation.en: Coming here after the war.
translation.zh: 你二战之后来的嘛

translation.en: F--first home in ruins, this new one beckoning.
translation.zh: 老家被毁了 新国家在召唤你

translation.en: Was it exhilarating? Was it terrifying?
translation.zh: 是不是很令人兴奋？ 还是恐惧？

translation.en: Bit of both.
translation.zh: 两者都有

translation.en: You were quite the adventuress.
translation.zh: 你还真喜欢冒险

translation.en: When Tom left the army and proposed to take me home to Lincoln,
translation.zh: 汤姆退役之后 提出想带我回林肯老家

translation.en: I thought he was crazy.
translation.zh: 我以为他疯了

translation.en: -It was a big change from Bavaria. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 这里跟巴伐利亚差别很大

translation.en: [Elsa] And I liked it. The people were…
translation.zh: 我喜欢这个想法 这里的人民…

translation.en: Well, they didn’t treat me as a German, or an enemy,
translation.zh: 并不把我当作德国人或敌人看待

translation.en: or even as a stranger. They were extraordinarily kind.
translation.zh: 甚至不把我当陌生人 他们都十分友善

translation.en: -It’s what I love about America. -[Elsa] Hmm.
translation.zh: 这就是我喜欢美国的地方

translation.en: It’s a rather small state, Nebraska, isn’t it?
translation.zh: 内布拉斯加州很小吧？

translation.en: [Elsa] You could fit the entire population into Georgetown.
translation.zh: 全州人口跟乔治敦一样多

translation.en: Did you know everyone?
translation.zh: 那里有你认识的人吗？

translation.en: -We were very close-knit. -[Ulrich] Yeah.
translation.zh: 大家走得都很近 是呀

translation.en: Did you know Chuck Hagel, the senator?
translation.zh: 你认识参议员查克黑格尔吗？

translation.en: [Chuck] Elsa? It’s Chuck. How are you, my dear?
translation.zh: 艾尔莎 我是查克 你好吗 亲爱的？

translation.en: Well, such a treat to hear from an old friend
translation.zh: （美国内布拉斯加州参议员查克黑格尔） 听到老朋友的消息真是太好了

translation.en: after such a long time.
translation.zh: 过了那么多年

translation.en: Look, we’d be delighted to be at your party
translation.zh: 我们很愿意参加你的晚宴

translation.en: honoring the French PM, no less. Hmm.
translation.zh: 纪念法国总理的到访 的确很重要

translation.en: Uh, well… I hope your caterer’s up to it.
translation.zh: 这个嘛 希望你的厨师可以胜任

translation.en: [Elsa] Motti, I don’t understand.
translation.zh: 莫特 我不明白

translation.en: Is Senator Hagel or Rocard the guest of honor?
translation.zh: 我们请的贵宾是黑格尔参议员还是罗卡德总理？

translation.en: -Both. -Ar-- are they aware of that?
translation.zh: 他们俩都是 他们知道吗？

translation.en: Yeah, well, just stop asking so many questions.
translation.zh: 知道 你别问东问西的了

translation.en: Be dressed and ready on time and everything will sort itself out.
translation.zh: 打扮好 准时出席一切都会安排妥当的

translation.en: -Is-- is Michel Rocard coming? -Yes!
translation.zh: 米歇尔罗卡德也来吗？ 来呀！

translation.en: Hagel is the chairman of the Senate Armed Services Committee.
translation.zh: 黑格尔是参议院军事委员会的主席

translation.en: He’ll come.
translation.zh: 他会来的

translation.en: -[Elsa] Do you still have the dog?
translation.zh: 你们家的狗还在吗？

translation.en: [Chuck] Do I have a dog?
translation.zh: 我有养狗吗？

translation.en: It only became famous because of the Oregon Trail.
translation.zh: 俄勒冈案之后才出名的

translation.en: States not so much where we come from.
translation.zh: 我们的家乡可没什么可说的

translation.en: Well… [clears throat] …it was what they could grow cheap in the climate.
translation.zh: 那种气候下种那类作物最便宜

translation.en: -Hmm. -It’s a brutal climate in the winter
translation.zh: 冬天很冷 所以收获季节很短

translation.en: and we’ve got a short growing season. You need something that’ll grow quickly.
translation.zh: 冬天很冷 所以收获季节很短 因此需要种些长得快的作物

translation.en: -My father was in corn. -[Ulrich] Oh, really?
translation.zh: -我父亲是种玉米的-哦 是吗？

translation.en: Um… I think we just proceed.
translation.zh: 我们可以进餐了

translation.en: -Oh, well, sure. -May I invite you?
translation.zh: -当然-请大家入席

translation.en: Come on, hon.
translation.zh: 走吧 亲爱的

translation.en: Please.
translation.zh: 请进

translation.en: [Elsa] Maybe, I think if I put you here. That’s where you belong.
translation.zh: 夫人 如果让您坐这边 我想这里最适合您

translation.en: -[doorbell ringing] -Excuse me. Um. Sit.
translation.zh: 失陪一下 请坐

translation.en: -Remarkable. -[Ulrich] Ah!
translation.zh: 太漂亮了

translation.en: Oh, just something I threw together.
translation.zh: 哦 我只是随便煮煮

translation.en: -You did the cooking? -Mm.
translation.zh: 菜是你做的？

translation.en: P-- Pardon me, but weren’t you wearing an eye patch the last time we met?
translation.zh: 恕我无礼 但上次见面时您是不是戴了个眼罩？

translation.en: An eye patch? -[chuckles] I don’t think so, no. -[all chuckle]
translation.zh: 眼罩？没有吧

translation.en: -I think a toast is in order. -[Chuck] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 我想该敬酒了

translation.en: To our guest of honor…
translation.zh: 敬我们的贵宾…

translation.en: Elsa Breht. N--not exactly as announced, I know,
translation.zh: 艾尔莎布莱特 这跟我们说的不一样 我知道

translation.en: but suddenly I realized none of us would be here
translation.zh: 但我突然意识到

translation.en: enjoying this marvelous evening without her.
translation.zh: 如果没有她 我们今晚不会齐聚一堂

translation.en: So, after all, that’s the most important thing, isn’t it?
translation.zh: 所以 无论怎么说 她都是最重要的人物 对吧？

translation.en: -Hear, hear. -Santé.
translation.zh: -同意-干杯

translation.en: -[all chuckle] -[Chuck] It has been… Pardon me to interrupt.
translation.zh: 抱歉打扰一下

translation.en: [Michel] You are a man of refined taste.
translation.zh: 你真是有品位的男人

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢您

translation.en: -[glasses clink] -Lovely.
translation.zh: 真好

translation.en: [Ulrich] As you both well know, only 110
translation.zh: 二位都知道

translation.en: out of more than 190 UN member states have designated these agencies.
translation.zh: 联合国190多个成员国里 只有110个指派了这种中介机构

translation.en: And only around about 30
translation.zh: 而只有30个国家

translation.en: have actually… actually established national exchange mechanisms.
translation.zh: 实际建立了国家交流机关 没错

translation.en: -Yes. -Now, this is exactly where the EPG’s ideally positioned
translation.zh: 这正是EPG的用武之地

translation.en: to generate some concrete progress and momentum.
translation.zh: 产生某种实质性进展与动力

translation.en: Well, it’s a very compelling presentation.
translation.zh: （知名人士小组联合主席 米歇尔罗卡德） 您的演讲非常引人注目当然 米歇尔是我的好朋友

translation.en: And, of course, Michel’s a dear friend.
translation.zh: 您的演讲非常引人注目当然 米歇尔是我的好朋友 （佩奇马森加拿大联合国大使）

translation.en: I’d be delighted to help out with anything he’s involved in.
translation.zh: 他所参与的任何项目我都愿意提供帮助

translation.en: -Wonderful. Thank you so much. -Thank you, Mr. Mott.
translation.zh: -太好了 非常感谢-谢谢你 莫特先生

translation.en: [chuckles] Or should I call you Count Albi?
translation.zh: 是否该称呼您阿尔比伯爵呢？

translation.en: Did my assistant use my family title? I told him not to.
translation.zh: 我的助理用了我们家族的爵位？我明明告诉他不要用的

translation.en: It’s not very democratic, is it? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 听上去一点儿都不民主 是不是？

translation.en: -[chuckles] -I’ll speak to him about it. Thank you.
translation.zh: 我会问他的 谢谢

translation.en: -[suspenseful music playing] -[Ulrich] University of Michigan.
translation.zh: 谢谢 密歇根大学

translation.en: Good school, but not top tier. Very little experience.
translation.zh: 虽然是好学校 但不是名校 没什么工作经验

translation.en: No contacts.
translation.zh: 没有人脉

translation.en: No roommate from Yale in the West Wing, or daddy’s law partner on the Hill?
translation.zh: 没有在白宫西翼工作的耶鲁室友 老爸也没有在国会山工作的律师搭档

translation.en: -[Ulrich chuckles] -Well, I just moved here from Michigan.
translation.zh: 我才刚从密歇根州搬来这里

translation.en: You remind me very much of a young Ulrich Mott.
translation.zh: 你令我想起年轻的奥立克莫特

translation.en: You’re hired.
translation.zh: 你被雇用了

translation.en: Michel Rocard and Ambassador Mason
translation.zh: 米歇尔罗卡德与马森大使… （乔治索罗斯办公室亿万富翁、政治活动家、慈善家）

translation.en: recommended I reach out to Mr. Soros directly.
translation.zh: （乔治索罗斯办公室亿万富翁、政治活动家、慈善家） …建议我直接与索罗斯先生联络

translation.en: I hope you don’t mind, uh, but I took the liberty
translation.zh: 希望您不要介意但我自作主张

translation.en: of bringing our materials myself. Why send a staffer?
translation.zh: 擅自把资料都带来了 何必让手下跑一趟呢？

translation.en: I’d like to walk you through them.
translation.zh: 我想给您介绍一下

translation.en: So I said to him, "Well, that may have worked in Jackson’s time."
translation.zh: （罗伯特麦克纳马拉 前国防部长） 于是我告诉他“或许杰克逊总统时代还行得通”

translation.en: Mr. McNamara?
translation.zh: 麦克纳马拉先生？

translation.en: -[Robert] Yes? -We haven’t met.
translation.zh: -什么事-我们没见过

translation.en: Ulrich Mott from the Eminent Persons Group.
translation.zh: 我是知名人士小组的奥立克莫特

translation.en: Forgive me, but the coincidence is extraordinary.
translation.zh: 请原谅 但是这也太巧了

translation.en: Just this morning, Mr. George Soros was recommending
translation.zh: 乔治索罗斯先生今早还建议我

translation.en: I get in touch with you. W--would you have a minute?
translation.zh: 跟您联系呢 您有时间吗？

translation.en: George? Certainly. Pull up a seat.
translation.zh: 乔治介绍的？ 当然了 拉张椅子过来

translation.en: [woman on TV] President Bush regards this as an historic moment…
translation.zh: （知名人士小组执行董事会） 布什总统认为这是历史性的一刻…

translation.en: [Ulrich] Now that a new chapter is beginning for both of our countries,
translation.zh: 如今我们两国都掀开了新的篇章

translation.en: we hope that you’ll consider our home a sort of second embassy.
translation.zh: 希望大家把这里当做是第二大使馆

translation.en: Just a few years ago, when I was just out of the service--
translation.zh: 数年前 我刚退役时…

translation.en: [Khatami] Were you in the military?
translation.zh: 您参过军？

translation.en: Hmm. Yeah. French Foreign Legion. Don’t get me started on those stories.
translation.zh: 对 法国外籍兵团别再问我那段经历了

translation.en: We won’t. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我们不会问的

translation.en: Anyway, I was weary, I admit. Burned out.
translation.zh: 总之 我承认那时…很疲惫 彻底透支

translation.en: But then I formed the EPG.
translation.zh: 但后来我成立了EPG

translation.en: He’s not only the most successful cricket captain
translation.zh: 他不仅是体育史上最有成就的板球队长…

translation.en: in the history of the sport-- You do know what cricket is, don’t you?
translation.zh: 他不仅是体育史上最有成就的板球队长… 你知道什么是板球吧？

translation.en: He’s also a member of the Pakistani fucking parliament.
translation.zh: 他还是巴基斯坦国会的议员

translation.en: Therefore, you cannot seat him next to the fucking waiter station!
translation.zh: 所以你绝对不能让他坐在侍应旁边！

translation.en: The only thing that looks good is this.
translation.zh: 只有这个东西顺眼

translation.en: [Ulrich] Diplomacy, Winston Churchill once said,
translation.zh: 温森特丘吉尔曾说过

translation.en: is the art of telling people to go to hell in such a way
translation.zh: 外交就是让某人去下地狱

translation.en: -that they ask for directions. -[crowd chuckles]
translation.zh: 那人还问你怎么走

translation.en: [Ulrich] With apologies to the Prime Minister,
translation.zh: 很抱歉 总理先生

translation.en: I prefer to think of it as the art of helping people
translation.zh: 我倒愿意把外交当成是

translation.en: to find their own path to heaven.
translation.zh: 帮助别人找到上天堂的路

translation.en: [Ulrich] A Ponzi scheme?
translation.zh: 庞氏骗局？

translation.en: [Durant] You get one name, and you use that
translation.zh: 你利用某人的名声

translation.en: to get the next, and the next, and the next, and the next.
translation.zh: 去找第二个人、第三个人、第四个人

translation.en: I think that’s just a bit unfair.
translation.zh: 我认为这不太公平

translation.en: Ponzi stole money.
translation.zh: 庞氏是偷钱的

translation.en: He bankrupted people. I was holding conferences.
translation.zh: 他令别人破产 而我只是开会而已

translation.en: But all right. I’m self-made. So what? Is that a crime?
translation.zh: 但是没错 我是自吹自擂 那又如何？ 这也犯法吗？或许在华盛顿算是

translation.en: [chuckles] Maybe in Washington it is.
translation.zh: 这也犯法吗？或许在华盛顿算是

translation.en: So a senator’s son was not my roommate at Yale.
translation.zh: 我并没有家世显赫的耶鲁室友

translation.en: -I built something myself. -What about Elsa?
translation.zh: 我都是靠自己 那么艾尔莎呢？

translation.en: -What about her? -[Volker] You used her.
translation.zh: -她怎么了？-你利用了她

translation.en: -Her money, her connections. -I did not use Elsa.
translation.zh: 你用她的钱 她的…人脉 我才没利用艾尔莎

translation.en: How could you suggest such a thing? She gave me what she did out of love.
translation.zh: 你怎敢这么说？ 她是出自爱才支持我的

translation.en: She gave me courage and a belief in myself.
translation.zh: 她给了我勇气 让我有自信

translation.en: I owe her everything.
translation.zh: 我的一切都是拜她所赐

translation.en: Which makes the accusation that has put me in here
translation.zh: 所以指控我谋杀她真是荒谬

translation.en: -all the more ludicrous. -[Volker] Mr. Mott…
translation.zh: 所以指控我谋杀她真是荒谬 莫特先生

translation.en: were you ever violent with your wife?
translation.zh: 您是否对妻子施过家暴？

translation.en: Were you?
translation.zh: 有过吗？

translation.en: Violent? No.
translation.zh: 家暴？ 没有

translation.en: Did I do things of which I’ve come to feel ashamed?
translation.zh: 但我是否做过可耻的事？

translation.en: Deeply ashamed? Of course.
translation.zh: 极其可耻的事？当然有过

translation.en: Show me a marriage where both partners have not made mistakes.
translation.zh: 你倒是说说看有哪对夫妻没有犯过错误

translation.en: Show me a marriage without regret.
translation.zh: 哪对夫妻没有悔恨

translation.en: The situation in Iraq is unacceptable to the American people.
translation.zh: 伊拉克的处境对美国人民来讲是难以接受的

translation.en: Our troops in Iraq have fought bravely.
translation.zh: 我们的军队在伊拉克英勇作战

translation.en: They have done everything we have asked them to do.
translation.zh: 完成了我们下达的所有命令

translation.en: Where mistakes have been made, the responsibility rests with me.
translation.zh: 所犯下的错误 由我来负责

translation.en: -[rain patters] -[Ulrich] What I am suggesting
translation.zh: （伊拉克大使馆华盛顿） 我的提议很简单

translation.en: is simply that the EPG is now ideally positioned
translation.zh: 现在正是EPG大展身手的时刻

translation.en: to play a much larger role in the reconstruction of post-war Iraq.
translation.zh: 可在伊拉克战后重建上扮演更重要的角色

translation.en: Well, let me-- let me first say
translation.zh: 首先 我想说

translation.en: how grateful we are to you already, Mr. Mott.
translation.zh: 我们非常感激您 莫特先生

translation.en: You and your wife have organized some marvelous events.
translation.zh: 您与夫人举办了几场精彩的聚会

translation.en: We’ve so enjoyed ourselves at your parties--
translation.zh: 我们在您的宴会上很开心…

translation.en: Fine, fine, but n--now it’s time to go beyond that.
translation.zh: 不客气 但是现在有更重要的事

translation.en: It’s all very well chatting with friends over cocktails,
translation.zh: 在鸡尾酒会上与朋友们闲聊的确很开心

translation.en: but now is a moment for action.
translation.zh: 但如今该采取行动了

translation.en: I see.
translation.zh: 我明白了

translation.en: And, uh, what sort of thing did you have in mind?
translation.zh: 您有什么打算？

translation.en: Well, it’s all detailed in this proposal, but broadly…
translation.zh: 都详细地写在这份提案里了 但总体而言…

translation.en: we bring together, in one location,
translation.zh: 我们在同一地点

translation.en: all the enemies of the United States and a free Iraq.
translation.zh: 召集美国和自由伊拉克的所有敌人

translation.en: So, uh, the Taliban, uh…
translation.zh: 塔利班、萨德尔和他的迈赫迪军

translation.en: Al-Sadr and the Madhi Army, the other jihadists, everyone.
translation.zh: 塔利班、萨德尔和他的迈赫迪军 以及其他圣战分子 所有人

translation.en: We meet on some relatively neutral territory,
translation.zh: 在某个相对中立的国家见个面

translation.en: let us say Kurdistan.
translation.zh: 比如库尔德斯坦

translation.en: And there we launch the mother of all peace conferences.
translation.zh: 然后开启一系列和平谈判

translation.en: Refereed, so to speak…
translation.zh: 可以说是进行裁判

translation.en: brokered, shepherded, whatever word you like, by the EPG.
translation.zh: 经纪人、牧羊人 随便你们喜欢怎么说都好 由EPG主办

translation.en: By you.
translation.zh: 由你主办

translation.en: Well, yes, in my capacity as the head of the EPG,
translation.zh: 对 作为EPG的主席

translation.en: I would oversee this process.
translation.zh: 我会监督整个过程

translation.en: I sent an identical, uh, proposal to Kofi, and, uh… [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我已经把同样的提案给了科菲一份…

translation.en: Sorry!
translation.zh: 抱歉！

translation.en: To the Secretary-General’s Office at the UN
translation.zh: 给了联合国秘书长办公室

translation.en: -and we’re going to discuss it Thursday. -What are those medals?
translation.zh: 我们将在周四讨论此事 那些是什么勋章？

translation.en: I’m sorry?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Those insignia on your chest. I’m just admiring them.
translation.zh: 您胸口上的徽章我正在欣赏它们

translation.en: But I’m afraid I don’t recognize any.
translation.zh: 但我不知道是什么勋章

translation.en: Um… the various honors I’ve accumulated over the--
translation.zh: 我多年积累的各种荣誉…

translation.en: Are any of them from the French Foreign Legion?
translation.zh: 有没有法国外籍军团的？

translation.en: I remember hearing you served.
translation.zh: 我记得您提过在那边服役

translation.en: -N--no, these are different. -Ah, I see.
translation.zh: 不是 这些是其他时期的 我明白了

translation.en: Back to the matter at hand.
translation.zh: 言归正传

translation.en: Mr. Mott, surely you must be aware that we want no association
translation.zh: 莫特先生 您一定知道 我们绝对不想

translation.en: with the Taliban, the Sadrists, or any of the parties you mentioned.
translation.zh: 与塔利班、迈赫迪军或者您所提到的任何一派合作

translation.en: Moreover, such an ambitious plan, if it’s indeed possible,
translation.zh: 再说了 如此宏伟的计划即便有可能实现

translation.en: would have to fall under the purview of the US State Department
translation.zh: 那也是美国国务院的事

translation.en: or the Organization of Arabic States or the UN.
translation.zh: 或者阿拉伯国家组织、联合国

translation.en: Read the proposal, why don’t you?
translation.zh: 不如看看这份提案吧？

translation.en: Perhaps, the French Foreign Legion could help.
translation.zh: 或许法国外籍军团能帮上忙

translation.en: Thank you for your time and for your concern.
translation.zh: 谢谢您关心

translation.en: If you have any other ideas, please don’t hesitate to let us know.
translation.zh: 如果您有其他想法请尽管告诉我们

translation.en: Our door is always open.
translation.zh: 我们的大门永远敞开

translation.en: [David] Mr. Mott, how’d it go? What’d they say?
translation.zh: 莫特先生 进展如何？他们怎么说？

translation.en: Very receptive. I’m very encouraged.
translation.zh: 他们很愿意接受 我倍受鼓舞

translation.en: -Do you want to go back to the office now? -No. You go.
translation.zh: -您想现在回办公室吗？-不 你去吧

translation.en: I’m gonna need a fucking drink.
translation.zh: 我得喝一杯

translation.en: -[Elsa] Where have you been? -[Ulrich] Working.
translation.zh: 你去哪儿了？ 工作

translation.en: [Elsa] Liar.
translation.zh: 撒谎

translation.en: -[scoffs] You stink of alcohol. -And you reek of the grave.
translation.zh: 你满身酒臭 你满身尸臭

translation.en: -Motti? -I’m sorry.
translation.zh: 莫特？ 很抱歉

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: They laughed at me… today at the embassy.
translation.zh: 今天在大使馆时 他们嘲笑我

translation.en: I brought them something magnificent and they laughed at me.
translation.zh: 我给他们提出宏伟的建议但他们嘲笑我

translation.en: -Oh, Motti. -[Ulrich] Sometimes I--
translation.zh: 莫特 有时侯 我…

translation.en: I think they are all laughing at me, you know?
translation.zh: 我觉得所有人都在嘲笑我你知道吗？

translation.en: The whole town, the whole-- the whole world.
translation.zh: 全城 全…全世界

translation.en: "Who does he think he is?"
translation.zh: “他以为自己是谁？

translation.en: [sniffs] "A little nobody from nowhere."
translation.zh: 一个没来头的无名小卒

translation.en: "His parents were failures, and he is a nothing."
translation.zh: 他的父母一事无成他也一文不值

translation.en: "Just a pathetic little joke to be laughed at."
translation.zh: 只是个可悲的嘲笑对象”

translation.en: Oh, M--Motti, Motti, I believe in you.
translation.zh: 哦 莫特 我相信你

translation.en: -[Ulrich sobs] -I will never laugh at you.
translation.zh: 我绝对不会嘲笑你

translation.en: Promise me. Please.
translation.zh: 答应我 求你了

translation.en: -I promise. -[Ulrich sobs]
translation.zh: 我答应你

translation.en: Elsa. [sobs]
translation.zh: 艾尔莎

translation.en: And just right this way is our Ambassador Suite.
translation.zh: 大使套房就在这边

translation.en: -Oh, no, no, no. We booked a normal room. -No, it’s correct. I upgraded us.
translation.zh: 不对 我们预订的是普通房间 没错 我给咱们升级了

translation.en: I hope you don’t mind. We deserve it.
translation.zh: 希望你别介意 这是我们应得的

translation.en: [chuckles] Oh, Motti! Oh, you are a devil.
translation.zh: 莫特！你真是魔鬼

translation.en: I’ll call you after my meeting. Are you sure you’ll be all right?
translation.zh: 我开完会就打给你你一个人行吗？

translation.en: -Of course. -Taxi.
translation.zh: -叫出租车-当然没问题

translation.en: I’ve been coming to New York since before you were born.
translation.zh: 我来纽约时你还没出世呢

translation.en: -Where will you be? -Bergdorf, Bendel’s, Chanel.
translation.zh: -你会去哪里？-贝尔多夫、本德尔、香奈儿

translation.en: Within a six-block radius, and I’m having tea with a friend.
translation.zh: 六点前回来 我约了朋友喝茶

translation.en: -Be good now. -I’ll be back around 6:00.
translation.zh: 要乖哟 我大约六点回来

translation.en: Don’t bankrupt us.
translation.zh: 别买到破产就好

translation.en: -[phone ringing] -Yes, darling?
translation.zh: 什么事 亲爱的？

translation.en: How is it in Boston?
translation.zh: 波士顿那边好吗？

translation.en: Now, listen, I’m in New York, and I have just found
translation.zh: 听着 我在纽约

translation.en: the most gorgeous Chopard watch for Ulrich.
translation.zh: 我看到一块漂亮的萧邦表送给奥立克

translation.en: No, no, no, no! Listen, listen, listen. He deserves it because he’s speaking
translation.zh: 不 你听我说 他应得的 因为他正在联合国大会上代表EPG发言

translation.en: at the United Nations conference for the EPG.
translation.zh: 他应得的 因为他正在联合国大会上代表EPG发言

translation.en: I’m so proud of him.
translation.zh: 我真为他感到自豪

translation.en: [Ulrich] I thought you were out shopping.
translation.zh: 我以为你去购物了

translation.en: I thought you were at the United Nations!
translation.zh: 我以为你去联合国大会了！

translation.en: -I finished. -Who’s this?
translation.zh: 会开完了 -他是谁？-朋友

translation.en: A friend.
translation.zh: -他是谁？-朋友

translation.en: -Goddamn it! Are you mad? -You! How could you? You disgrace!
translation.zh: 哎呀！该死的！你疯了？ 你！你怎能这样？不要脸！

translation.en: Don’t make such a fuss.
translation.zh: 别小题大做

translation.en: -Why did you do this? -You didn't expect me
translation.zh: 你怎么能这样？

translation.en: -to stay celibate all these years-- -[Elsa] Keep it out of my sight.
translation.zh: 你不会以为我这么些年真的做鳏夫吧

translation.en: You had to keep it out of our life, out of my bed, out of my sight!
translation.zh: 那你也不能影响我们的生活不能上我们的床 不能让我看见！

translation.en: There never was a UN meeting, was there?
translation.zh: 根本没有什么联合国大会 对吧？

translation.en: How could there be? Whoever would want to meet with you?
translation.zh: 怎么可能会有？ 谁会想见你？

translation.en: -Never speak to me like that! -You lie! You lie, you lie, you lie!
translation.zh: 你别用这种语气跟我说话 你撒谎！

translation.en: -Every syllable you utter is a lie! -Look, I'm sorry. I’m really sorry.
translation.zh: -你说的每一个字都是谎话！-很抱歉

translation.en: If he had told me that his mother was staying here, I--
translation.zh: 如果他告诉我他母亲也住这里 我就…

translation.en: Yes! Why don’t you knock next time, Mother?
translation.zh: 没错！拜托您下次敲门 好吗 母亲？

translation.en: -Go ahead, bitch. Do it. -[yelps]
translation.zh: 来呀 婊子 动手呀

translation.en: Out! Out!
translation.zh: 滚！

translation.en: Go! You are nothing!
translation.zh: 滚！ 你什么也不是

translation.en: You’re just a lying, depraved, disgusting gigolo!
translation.zh: 你就是个骗子吃软饭的堕落小白脸

translation.en: Oh, my God. This could take all afternoon.
translation.zh: 我的天呀 你扔一下午也扔不完来吧 我来帮你

translation.en: Here, let me help you. Better yet, let’s do yours, shall we?
translation.zh: 你扔一下午也扔不完来吧 我来帮你 不如扔你的吧 怎么样？

translation.en: You stop it! Stop it!
translation.zh: 你住手！住手！

translation.en: This suite is in my name and you are no longer welcome here.
translation.zh: 套房是用我的名字订的 这里不欢迎你了

translation.en: [Amanda] So you’ve no idea where he is? No.
translation.zh: -你不知道他去哪了吗？-不知道

translation.en: Had you been having problems?
translation.zh: 你们有什么问题吗？

translation.en: Only what any normal couple goes through. Don’t say we’re not a normal couple.
translation.zh: 都是正常夫妻会遇到的问题 别说我们不是正常夫妻

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 我没说

translation.en: I only wish I knew where he was.
translation.zh: 要是知道他在哪儿就好了

translation.en: [attorney] Was there a complaint signed against Mr. Mott in 2006
translation.zh: 死者是否于2006年状告过莫特先生

translation.en: -by the decedent, Mrs. Breht? -[Grant] Yes.
translation.zh: -也就是布莱特女士？-是的

translation.en: [attorney] In which she was locked out of her hotel room and assaulted?
translation.zh: 说她被锁在酒店房间外还遭到袭击？

translation.en: And Mr. Mott threw a bowl of, uh, soup at Mrs. Breht?
translation.zh: 莫特先生往布莱特女士身上扔了一碗汤？

translation.en: -Objection. -Sustained.
translation.zh: -反对-反对有效

translation.en: Well, I beg your pardon.
translation.zh: 请原谅

translation.en: The, uh, report merely stated she had "soup in her hair
translation.zh: 报告只说 她的“头发和衣服上有汤水”

translation.en: and on her clothes,"
translation.zh: 她的“头发和衣服上有汤水”

translation.en: and when the police arrived, they found a woman in her 80's
translation.zh: 警察抵达时 看到一位80多岁的妇女

translation.en: locked out of her suite with all of her baggage.
translation.zh: 被锁在套房门外 还有所有行李

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: No more questions.
translation.zh: 没有其他问题了

translation.en: You’ve identified Government Exhibit four which is the document
translation.zh: 你提出政府第四号证据 这份文件是她死后第二天

translation.en: presented to Mrs. Breht’s daughter the day after she was found dead.
translation.zh: 这份文件是她死后第二天 给布莱特女士的女儿的

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: So if the will you identified stands,
translation.zh: 如果你所提供的遗嘱属实他会从中获益吗？

translation.en: -would he stand to gain anything? -Yes.
translation.zh: 如果你所提供的遗嘱属实他会从中获益吗？ 是的

translation.en: Between 250,000 and 300,000 dollars, as well as Mrs. Breht’s house.
translation.zh: 二十五万至三十万美金之间还有布莱特女士的房产

translation.en: Exhibit 24, very helpfully provided by the defense,
translation.zh: 第24号证据 是被告提交的

translation.en: confirming Ulrich Gero Mott’s appointment as Brigadier General of the Iraqi Army
translation.zh: 证明奥立克盖洛莫特 被任命为伊拉克军队准将

translation.en: by Nouri al-Maliki, the prime minister and acting minister of defense of Iraq.
translation.zh: 由努里马利基授予 伊拉克总理兼国防部长

translation.en: And this is confirming my own appointment
translation.zh: 而这份证书

translation.en: as People magazine’s sexiest man of the year,
translation.zh: 证明我是《人物》杂志年度最性感男士 证明人是英女王…

translation.en: -certified by Her Majesty, Queen… -Objection!
translation.zh: 证明人是英女王… 反对！

translation.en: …Elizabeth II of England, and it’s printed via…
translation.zh: …英国第二性感 这张证书…

translation.en: -Objection! -…the website freequalitycertificates.com.
translation.zh: -反对！-…是从网站上打印的 “免费资历证书网”

translation.en: [Ulrich] That was a fucking disaster.
translation.zh: 真是灾难

translation.en: It was a bloodbath. You just sat there doing nothing.
translation.zh: 简直是狗血淋头 你就干坐着什么也不说
