translation.en: Well, you tell me what we were supposed to do.
translation.zh: 那你告诉我该怎么办

translation.en: You have an assault charge. That’s probable cause right there.
translation.zh: 你有伤人案底 这就满足了合理性

translation.en: And I was so mortified, so ashamed that I left the country for two years.
translation.zh: 我因那件事十分愧疚所以离开美国两年

translation.en: Why don’t you let me tell them about that?
translation.zh: 为何不告诉他们这件事？

translation.en: Sure, so you can also tell them how you became an Iraqi brigadier general.
translation.zh: 当然 你也可以告诉他们自己是怎么当上伊拉克准将的

translation.en: My credentials are 100% genuine, despite that moronic courtroom stunt.
translation.zh: 我的证书百分百是真的 别信法庭上那场表演

translation.en: How could you two amateurs have let that go unchallenged?
translation.zh: 你们这两个外行怎么不提出疑问？

translation.en: That alone is grounds for a mistrial.
translation.zh: 仅此一项就会造成冤案

translation.en: You’re sure someone else killed your wife, but you have no idea who.
translation.zh: 你一口咬定是别人杀了你的妻子但你却不知道是谁

translation.en: You won’t even tell us where you went the night of the 11th.
translation.zh: 你都不告诉我们11号晚上去了哪里

translation.en: I told you a thousand times,
translation.zh: 我说了一千次了 我出去散步

translation.en: -I went for a fucking walk. -That isn’t good enough!
translation.zh: 我说了一千次了 我出去散步 这不够！

translation.en: I’m sorry. It’s bullshit. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 抱歉 这些都是废话

translation.en: Yeah, it is.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: And you’re right. This is not going your way.
translation.zh: 你说得对 案情发展对你不利

translation.en: So if you have another theory on this case,
translation.zh: 所以 如果你对此案有其他解释

translation.en: then you should really share it with us because we’re running out of options here.
translation.zh: 真的应该告诉我们 因为我们已经无计可施了

translation.en: I was reluctant to do this.
translation.zh: 我本不想说的

translation.en: Could create difficulties for a number of innocent people.
translation.zh: 会连累很多无辜的人

translation.en: People who do not deserve to be dragged into this mess, but…
translation.zh: 他们不应被卷进这件事 不过…

translation.en: If you want to know my theory of the case, as you call it…
translation.zh: 如果你们想知道我对此案的看法 正如你所说…

translation.en: I urge you to speak at the earliest opportunity
translation.zh: 还请你们尽早联系

translation.en: to a Mr. David Weatherford.
translation.zh: 大卫韦瑟福德先生

translation.en: -Weatherford? -[Ulrich] Weatherford.
translation.zh: 韦瑟福德？ 对 韦瑟福德

translation.en: He’s deputy assistant for Mideast affairs at the State Department
translation.zh: 他在国务院是中东事务局的副助理

translation.en: and he has my complete confidence and trust.
translation.zh: 我充分信任他

translation.en: He’s in possession of materials that, properly analyzed…
translation.zh: 他那里有些资料 做过适当分析…

translation.en: may expose the actual parties responsible for Elsa’s death.
translation.zh: 或许能揭露杀害艾尔莎的真正凶手

translation.en: I advise you to prepare yourselves.
translation.zh: 但你们要有心理准备

translation.en: The information is bound to be…
translation.zh: 那些信息一定…

translation.en: disturbing, at best,
translation.zh: 往好处说 是令人不安

translation.en: but in a worst-case scenario, geopolitically destabilizing.
translation.zh: 往坏处说 会引起地缘政治纷争

translation.en: Ask him for my communiqués.
translation.zh: 找他要我的新闻稿

translation.en: Ask him about Zarathustra.
translation.zh: 问他查拉图斯特拉的事

translation.en: [Volker] Here we go. Just--
translation.zh: 他来了 韦瑟福德？

translation.en: -Yeah, Weatherford? -You Volker?
translation.zh: 他来了 韦瑟福德？ 你是沃克吗？

translation.en: -This is Durant, my partner. -[David] Hey.
translation.zh: 这位是杜兰特 我的搭档 你好

translation.en: -You read all these? -Yes.
translation.zh: 这些你都看过？ 对

translation.en: And?
translation.zh: 然后呢？

translation.en: -You’ll see. -[siren wailing]
translation.zh: 你会知道的

translation.en: Hello. Hello? Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: -[Ulrich over phone] Hello, Elsa? -Motti!
translation.zh: 喂 艾尔莎吗？ 莫特！

translation.en: Motti, is that you? Where-- where are you?
translation.zh: 莫特 是你吗？你在哪？

translation.en: [Ulrich over phone] I’ve been busy. I think it’s unlikely
translation.zh: 我一直很忙 我想最近你是不会见到我了

translation.en: -you’ll see me for some time-- -Yes, but where are you?
translation.zh: 我想最近你是不会见到我了 对 但是你在哪？

translation.en: [Ulrich over phone] The connection is poor.
translation.zh: 这里的通讯很差

translation.en: And in any case,
translation.zh: 而且无论怎么说

translation.en: you may not have wanted to hear from me at all,
translation.zh: 你或许根本不想收到我的消息

translation.en: but this is the most exhilarating, terrifying,
translation.zh: 但这次的工作是最令人兴奋 恐惧

translation.en: important work I’ve ever done and I can’t enjoy it without you.
translation.zh: 也是最重要的一次 但没有你我无法享受工作的乐趣

translation.en: I miss you so much. That’s all I called to say.
translation.zh: 我很想念你 所以我才打给你

translation.en: [Elsa over phone] Yes, yes, yes. Where are y--
translation.zh: 好吧 你在…

translation.en: [David] Dan?
translation.zh: 丹！

translation.en: Have you ever heard of someone called Ulrich Mott?
translation.zh: 你听说过奥立克莫特这个人吗？

translation.en: No. Should I?
translation.zh: 没听过 我应该知道？

translation.en: -Yeah, I’m pretty sure we should. -[Dan] Why?
translation.zh: -对 我敢肯定我们应该知道这个人-为什么？

translation.en: Because he seems more or less single-handedly
translation.zh: 因为他似乎正打算单凭一己之力

translation.en: to be trying to stop the insurgency.
translation.zh: 阻止目前这场的战乱

translation.en: "Urgent. From: Ulrich Mott, Villa Zarathustra, Sadr City, Iraq."
translation.zh: “紧急 寄件人奥立克莫特伊拉克 萨德市 查拉图斯特拉村

translation.en: "To: Undersecretary for Mideast Affairs eyes only."
translation.zh: 收件人：中东事务局副局长机密文件

translation.en: "Do not distribute."
translation.zh: 请勿广传

translation.en: "November 14th, 2006. Baghdad."
translation.zh: 2006年11月14日 巴格达

translation.en: "I am one of the few who is in direct contact
translation.zh: 与伊拉克内战双方领导人都有直接联系的人

translation.en: with both the leading heads of the national insurgency,
translation.zh: 为数不多 我是其中之一

translation.en: including Messrs. Al-Sadr and Hakim,
translation.zh: 包括萨德尔和哈基姆

translation.en: and the foreign jihadists, notably Abu Ayyub al-Masri,
translation.zh: 境外圣战主义者基地组织领袖

translation.en: head of Al-Qaeda."
translation.zh: 阿布艾尤卜穆哈吉尔”

translation.en: It, uh, just came over the transom. He’s the head of a small NGO, uh…
translation.zh: 这是我们刚收到的 这人是一个小型非政府组织的主席…

translation.en: some pretty heavy hitters on his board. Soros, Robert McNamara.
translation.zh: 他们的董事会尽是些名人… 索罗斯、罗伯特麦克纳马拉

translation.en: He seems to be working as some sort of envoy to Muqtada al-Sadr.
translation.zh: 他似乎正在担任穆克塔达萨德尔的某种使节

translation.en: Wait! What?
translation.zh: 慢着！你说什么？

translation.en: [David] He says he’s trying to steer the Madhi Army away
translation.zh: 他说他正在试图说服迈赫迪军

translation.en: from violence and towards some sort of peace settlement.
translation.zh: 放弃暴力 转而采取和平手段

translation.en: "I am seriously thinking of accepting Al-Sadr’s offer to embed."
translation.zh: “我正认真考虑接受萨德尔的任命

translation.en: "Let ours be the guns heard last. Ulrich."
translation.zh: 让枪声不再响起 奥立克”

translation.en: Who the fuck authorized the embed of a German national
translation.zh: 谁他妈准许一个德国佬潜入迈赫迪军的

translation.en: with the Madhi Army? And said he could negotiate on our behalf?
translation.zh: 谁他妈准许一个德国佬潜入迈赫迪军的 还代表我们进行谈判？

translation.en: Nobody.
translation.zh: 没有人批准

translation.en: And it appears he’s doing all of this on his own initiative.
translation.zh: 似乎是他独自决定的

translation.en: Well, make him fucking stop!
translation.zh: 那就快阻止他！

translation.en: [David] "December 7th, 2006. Villa Zarathustra, Sadr City."
translation.zh: “2006年12月7日萨德尔市 查拉图斯特拉村

translation.en: "Dear Mr. Secretary, thank you for the message of encouragement."
translation.zh: 亲爱的秘书长先生谢谢您鼓励我

translation.en: "I regret I was unable to take your call,
translation.zh: 很遗憾我没能接听您的电话

translation.en: but the brothers are very strict on non-intrusions from the secular,
translation.zh: 这里的弟兄们很严格不准世俗之人闯入

translation.en: especially during prayers."
translation.zh: 尤其是在祷告的时候”

translation.en: [man] You don’t have any way of contacting him?
translation.zh: 你们没法联络上他吗？

translation.en: Is Mott running this organization or not?
translation.zh: 管理这个组织的究竟是不是莫特？

translation.en: He hasn’t been in touch with me in a while.
translation.zh: 他已经很久没联系过我了

translation.en: All I know is he’s somewhere in the Middle East.
translation.zh: 我只知道他在中东某地

translation.en: If you find him, could you ask him when I’m gonna get paid?
translation.zh: 如果你们找到他可否问问他什么时候发工资？

translation.en: You wouldn’t believe it. Mookie-- Al-Sadr, he wears these dentures.
translation.zh: 你不会相信 小穆…萨德尔戴的是假牙

translation.en: You see, they don’t fit him very well. They give him a lisp.
translation.zh: 假牙并不合适 所以他说话咬舌头

translation.en: When he tried to say the word "assassin," it came out "athathin."
translation.zh: 他想说“刺客” 结果说成了“吃客”

translation.en: -[chuckles] -[Ulrich over phone] Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 我的老天

translation.en: And when he gets mad, he takes them out altogether.
translation.zh: 他生气时会把假牙全拿下来

translation.en: I keep trying to discourage this and I emphasize there’s two priorities…
translation.zh: 我一直想说服他 我强调有两件事很重要…

translation.en: keep the dentures in, make peace with the Americans.
translation.zh: 戴好假牙还有 与美国人和平相处

translation.en: But not necessarily in that order.
translation.zh: 但不一定按这个顺序来

translation.en: [man] And Mrs. Breht…
translation.zh: 布莱特夫人

translation.en: what your husband appears to be doing, conducting a sort of…
translation.zh: 您丈夫的行径 是某种单枪匹马

translation.en: one-man, freelance diplomatic mission
translation.zh: 自由外交任务

translation.en: in a nation with which we are actively engaged
translation.zh: 对方是我们正打得火热的国家

translation.en: is just extraordinarily counterproductive and ill advised.
translation.zh: 这会适得其反我们强烈建议不要这么做

translation.en: It’s frankly unprecedented.
translation.zh: 坦白说 这是前所未有的

translation.en: We don’t understand how anyone could possibly think it could succeed.
translation.zh: 我们不明白怎么会有人认为这样能成功

translation.en: You don’t know Ulrich.
translation.zh: 那是你们不了解奥立克

translation.en: [David] "26 December, 2007, Villa Zarathustra."
translation.zh: “2007年12月26日 查拉图斯特拉村

translation.en: "As you are aware, I first outlined the proposition
translation.zh: 正如阁下所知 我在备忘录中提出

translation.en: to enlist Sunni insurgents and Shia militias in a memorandum
translation.zh: 招募逊尼派叛乱分子和什叶派民兵

translation.en: to then UN Sec-Gen Annan in 2004,
translation.zh: 此提案早于2004年时交给了当时的联合国秘书长安南

translation.en: and had the outline circulated at the Iraqi embassy."
translation.zh: 然后我将此份提案送往伊拉克大使馆

translation.en: "It formed the basis of my original Iraq mission
translation.zh: 这是我于2006秋天抵达巴格达时

translation.en: upon arriving in Baghdad in fall 2006, a mission I continue to pursue,
translation.zh: 原定的伊拉克任务 我至今仍在进行此项任务

translation.en: albeit one I sometimes fear I will not live to complete."
translation.zh: 尽管有时我担心自己无法活着完成任务”

translation.en: We’ve been studying your emails from Iraq.
translation.zh: 我们研究了你从伊拉克写来的电邮

translation.en: I knew David would come through. He is a good man.
translation.zh: 我就知道大卫能行 他是个好人

translation.en: And he’s taking quite a risk. These are highly classified.
translation.zh: 他冒了相当大的风险因为这些文件都是高级机密

translation.en: That’s actually something we wanted to ask.
translation.zh: 这正是我们想问的

translation.en: Since you sent them, they are your messages.
translation.zh: 既然是你寄出的信息

translation.en: Why couldn’t you have just given them to us from the beginning?
translation.zh: 你为何不在一开始就给我们看

translation.en: A little test, Mr. Volker, and one you’ve passed with flying colors.
translation.zh: 我是在试探你 沃克先生 你出色地通过了

translation.en: Test. Okay.
translation.zh: 试探我 好吧

translation.en: You discuss a number of missions--
translation.zh: 你说了许多任务…

translation.en: Hang on! One second, one second! One second.
translation.zh: 等一下！慢着

translation.en: You’re not recording this, are you?
translation.zh: 你没录音吧？

translation.en: No. This is just us trying to understand.
translation.zh: 没有 我们只是想搞清楚整件事

translation.en: Very well. Carry on.
translation.zh: 那很好 你接着说

translation.en: The missions you went on, on behalf of Al-Sadr…
translation.zh: 你代表萨德尔进行的这项任务…

translation.en: Mookie, yes.
translation.zh: 小穆嘛 对

translation.en: …you wrote that you had potentially antagonized
translation.zh: …你写道 可能会叛乱分子与你作对

translation.en: some of the insurgent factions, groups affiliated with Al-Qaeda in Iraq.
translation.zh: 某些伊拉克基地组织成员

translation.en: Groups that didn’t want Al-Sadr making a peace deal with the US,
translation.zh: 他们不想让萨德尔与美国签订和平协议

translation.en: who would blame you if that came about.
translation.zh: 如果和平协议达成 他们会责怪你

translation.en: Yeah. Very good, Mr. Volker. Very good indeed.
translation.zh: 没错 非常好 沃克先生 的确非常好

translation.en: You’ve got the scent in your nostrils now. Keep hunting.
translation.zh: 你现在有那种嗅觉了 接着找

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Mr. Mott…
translation.zh: 莫特先生…

translation.en: why don’t you just tell us who you think…
translation.zh: 你不如直接告诉我们吧 你认为…

translation.en: killed your wife?
translation.zh: 是谁杀了你的妻子？

translation.en: Okay. We’re your attorneys. We are trying to help you.
translation.zh: 我们是你的律师 尽力帮你

translation.en: But you keep throwing us these curveballs.
translation.zh: 但你却一直拐弯抹角

translation.en: We’ve done all of this work, and… you tell us to keep hunting.
translation.zh: 我们做了这么多 而… 你却告诉我们接着找

translation.en: I mean, we have been studying these things. I mean, I just…
translation.zh: 我们研究了这些东西 我是说 我…

translation.en: [Ulrich] For God’s sake, man.
translation.zh: 看在上帝份上 我的天啊

translation.en: Do we really have to go through this all over again?
translation.zh: 非得再从头说一次不可吗？

translation.en: Operational security, eyes only, need to know.
translation.zh: 国家安全、机密、须知

translation.en: Do you really imagine I’ve achieved what I have
translation.zh: 你认为我如果不小心保护机密情报

translation.en: by being reckless with privileged information?
translation.zh: 我能有这样的成就吗？

translation.en: Oh, God, the two of you really are hopeless.
translation.zh: 我的天呀 你们俩真是没救了

translation.en: I’m afraid I shall be representing myself from now on.
translation.zh: 恐怕我从现在开始要为自己辩护了

translation.en: Good day to you both.
translation.zh: 再见吧 二位

translation.en: [Amanda] So, you’ll get the grocery delivery every week.
translation.zh: 每周都会有人送日用品来

translation.en: -It’s all set up. -All right.
translation.zh: -我都安排好了-好的

translation.en: [Amanda] And if you want to change anything in the order,
translation.zh: 如果你想改变订单中的内容

translation.en: -the number’s by the phone in the kitchen. -[Elsa] All right.
translation.zh: 就打厨房里电话旁边写的那个号码 好啦

translation.en: I’ll be back next month. It’s the midterm break.
translation.zh: 我下个月会再来 到时有期中假

translation.en: Just call me if you need anything. I could maybe come back earlier--
translation.zh: 如果你需要什么就打给我我可以提早过来… 别说了 我绝对没问题

translation.en: -Stop it. I’ll be absolutely fine. -[Amanda] And I left some casseroles
translation.zh: 别说了 我绝对没问题 我在厨房冷冻柜里留了些法式烤蔬菜以防万一你没吃的

translation.en: in the kitchen in the freezer, just in case.
translation.zh: 我在厨房冷冻柜里留了些法式烤蔬菜以防万一你没吃的

translation.en: -[Elsa] Oh, you know I despise casseroles. -[Amanda chuckles]
translation.zh: 哦 你知道我可瞧不起法式烤菜了

translation.en: [Elsa] Oh, dear. [whimpers] Oh, dear.
translation.zh: 哦 亲爱的 哦 亲爱的

translation.en: -[sobs] -What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: He calls me sometimes.
translation.zh: 他时不时会打电话给我

translation.en: -What? -He sounds so far away.
translation.zh: 什么？ 听上去他似乎在很远的地方

translation.en: -But also like he’s next door. -Don’t take his calls. Please.
translation.zh: 但又感觉他就在隔壁 别再接他的电话了 求你了

translation.en: You are so much better off. You know that. Wherever the hell he is.
translation.zh: 没有他你过得好多了这你知道 别管他在哪

translation.en: He’s in Iraq.
translation.zh: 他在伊拉克

translation.en: Iraq?
translation.zh: 伊拉克？

translation.en: He’s doing extraordinary things.
translation.zh: 他正在进行很了不起的工作

translation.en: I keep replaying that day in New York in my head over and over
translation.zh: 纽约那天的事 一直在我脑中不停重演

translation.en: and h--how you stood me, I can’t imagine.
translation.zh: 难以想像 你是如何忍受我的

translation.en: [Elsa over phone] It’s in the past.
translation.zh: 都过去了

translation.en: And I was not always so easy.
translation.zh: 我有时也不够冷静

translation.en: When I’m finished here, is there a ch-- No, no. I shouldn’t.
translation.zh: 等我在这里的任务完成后是否能…不行 我不该那样

translation.en: No, no. Go on, go on.
translation.zh: 不 你接着说

translation.en: Just knowing there is a possibility
translation.zh: 只要知道有这种可能性

translation.en: would be enough to sustain me through the trials ahead.
translation.zh: 就能够支撑我熬过接下来的挑战

translation.en: Is there a chance that I could come home?
translation.zh: 我是否能回家呢？

translation.en: To Georgetown? To you?
translation.zh: 回到乔治敦去？ 回到你那里？

translation.en: [Elsa over phone] Oh, no. No, no, no, maybe.
translation.zh: 哦 不行 或许吧

translation.en: I’ve experienced today one of the most sublime,
translation.zh: 我今天经历了人生中最崇高

translation.en: the most exquisite moments of my life.
translation.zh: 最美丽的时刻

translation.en: I’ve been on watch at Mookie’s camp all night
translation.zh: 我整晚都在观望着小穆的营地

translation.en: and it gets very cold in the desert at night.
translation.zh: 夜晚的荒漠格外寒冷

translation.en: The chill creeps into your bones and the doubt.
translation.zh: 寒意入骨 令我产生怀疑

translation.en: And I was wondering what it was all for.
translation.zh: 我不知道这一切都是为了什么

translation.en: Whether there was any real purpose for my being here at all.
translation.zh: 我在这里究竟有什么意义

translation.en: And then I heard the music.
translation.zh: 然后我听到了音乐声

translation.en: Mookie had found, God knows how,
translation.zh: 天知道小穆是怎么找到的

translation.en: a recording of a Prussian military march and played it over the camp loudspeaker.
translation.zh: 普鲁士军进行曲的录音 用营地的大喇叭播放

translation.en: And I have no idea how he knew that I loved that music from childhood,
translation.zh: 我不知道他怎么知道我从小就喜欢这首曲子

translation.en: let alone how he found a recording.
translation.zh: 更不知道他是怎么找到录音的

translation.en: Then the men formed up…
translation.zh: 然后士兵们集合起来

translation.en: and paid a tribute to me.
translation.zh: 向我敬礼

translation.en: And he was telling me… I belonged.
translation.zh: 他告诉我…我是他们的一份子

translation.en: That my efforts here have not been wasted.
translation.zh: 告诉我在这里的努力并没有白费

translation.en: That I have made a difference after all.
translation.zh: 我毕竟还是有所作为

translation.en: And that, perhaps, now…
translation.zh: 或许现在…

translation.en: [Ulrich over phone] …it’s time to come home.
translation.zh: 到了我该回家的时候

translation.en: Come in.
translation.zh: 进来吧

translation.en: [Ulrich] Sorry. I was just picking up the mail. One second.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我去取信了 稍等

translation.en: Oh, okay. That’s better.
translation.zh: 这样就好了

translation.en: [paramedic] Yeah. Right over there.
translation.zh: 对 在这边

translation.en: That way. Inside there.
translation.zh: 走那边 在里面

translation.en: I said that dozens, possibly hundreds of times.
translation.zh: 我已经说了几十遍可能几百遍都有了

translation.en: I’m not guilty of the murder of my wife Elsa Breht.
translation.zh: 我的妻子艾尔莎布莱特不是我杀的

translation.en: [judge] It was my understanding
translation.zh: 就我所知

translation.en: that you were no longer representing Mr. Mott.
translation.zh: 你们已经不再为莫特先生辩护

translation.en: Where is the defendant?
translation.zh: 被告人呢？

translation.en: [Volker] Your Honor,
translation.zh: 法官大人 莫特先生这几周来

translation.en: uh, Mr. Mott has refused to communicate with either me or my colleague
translation.zh: 法官大人 莫特先生这几周来 拒绝与我或我的同事联络

translation.en: for several weeks now, so we’re unable to proceed.
translation.zh: 拒绝与我或我的同事联络 因此我们无法回答

translation.en: What’s going on, Counselor?
translation.zh: 怎么回事 律师？

translation.en: Uh, Mr. Mott is currently engaged in a hunger strike.
translation.zh: 莫特先生目前正在绝食抗议

translation.en: He’s in a weakened condition and has since been moved to a hospital.
translation.zh: 他身体虚弱 已经被送进医院了

translation.en: W--we’re therefore submitting a motion to have him declared unfit for trial.
translation.zh: 因此我们提议宣布他不适宜出庭

translation.en: Well, the court will have to make a determination about that.
translation.zh: 那要等法庭决定

translation.en: [Volker] Of course.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: -Thank you. -[woman] I’m so sorry.
translation.zh: -谢谢-很遗憾

translation.en: -Thank you. Thank you very much. -[woman] Okay.
translation.zh: 谢谢 非常感谢 不客气

translation.en: Are you really gonna help him wiggle out of this?
translation.zh: 你真的要帮他脱罪吗？

translation.en: We have to wait for the evaluation.
translation.zh: 要等评估结果出来才知道

translation.en: -If he’s found mentally unfit-- -He’s faking. It’s obvious.
translation.zh: 如果他精神上不适合… 他是装的 显而易见

translation.en: -Like he faked everything. -You don’t know that.
translation.zh: -一切都是他假装的-这你可不知道

translation.en: I don’t know that.
translation.zh: 我也不知道

translation.en: The more I find out about this guy, the less I understand.
translation.zh: 我越了解这个人 就越不理解他

translation.en: You know, every word he says is a fucking lie.
translation.zh: 你知道他所说的每一个字都是谎言

translation.en: Maybe.
translation.zh: 或许是吧

translation.en: But what about Iraq?
translation.zh: 但伊拉克的事呢？

translation.en: How the hell did he do what he did there?
translation.zh: 他那些事究竟是怎么做到的？

translation.en: Can you explain that?
translation.zh: 你能解释吗？

translation.en: I can’t.
translation.zh: 我就不能

translation.en: Can’t you do this in the morning?
translation.zh: 明早再收拾不行吗？

translation.en: Yes, I could. I’d just like to clear some of it now.
translation.zh: 倒是可以 但我想先收拾一部分

translation.en: Yes, but then you’ll-- you'll be up until 2:00 a.m.,
translation.zh: 是呀 你忙到两点

translation.en: and you’ll wake me when you come upstairs.
translation.zh: 上楼来会吵醒我

translation.en: I’m sorry that my clearing up after our party disturbs your rest.
translation.zh: 那还真是不好意思收拾我们的晚宴吵到你了

translation.en: [Elsa] Our party? As if anyone could get a word in.
translation.zh: “我们的”晚宴？别人都插不上话

translation.en: It’s Amanda, isn’t it? She put you in this mood.
translation.zh: 因为阿曼达吧？ 是她破坏了你的心情

translation.en: Why you invite that sour little bitch, I’ll never--
translation.zh: 你为何邀请那个小婊子我真不明白…

translation.en: Don’t you talk about my daughter like that.
translation.zh: 不许你这么说我女儿

translation.en: And don’t you dare smoke that in my house.
translation.zh: 也不许你在我的房子里抽烟

translation.en: Yeah. Excellent. Um, can we talk?
translation.zh: 对 很好 我们能谈谈吗？

translation.en: N-not on the telephone. It’s not prudent. But it has to be in person.
translation.zh: 电话里不行 不合适 必须当面讲

translation.en: -Who is that? Who are you talking to? -Quiet!
translation.zh: -是谁？你在跟谁打电话？-闭嘴！

translation.en: Um… well, as soon as you can.
translation.zh: 越快越好

translation.en: -I-- I can meet you now. -No, you can’t.
translation.zh: -我可以现在见你-不行

translation.en: That would-- Shut your fucking face!
translation.zh: 那就… 你他妈给我闭嘴！

translation.en: Can’t I have a second’s peace?
translation.zh: 给我消停一秒钟行吗？

translation.en: Why don’t you crawl away to your bed? Go! Go to bed!
translation.zh: 你干脆爬到床上去好了滚！去睡觉！

translation.en: Excuse me. The usual place? Yeah. Excellent, excellent.
translation.zh: 很抱歉 老地方见吗？ 好 很好

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Who was that?
translation.zh: 是谁打来的？

translation.en: That is on a need-to-know basis and you do not need to know.
translation.zh: 这要看你是否需要知情而你不需要知道

translation.en: You’re late.
translation.zh: 你迟到了

translation.en: Is it Halloween already?
translation.zh: 到万圣节了吗？

translation.en: -Should’ve worn my cowboy hat. -Very amusing.
translation.zh: 那我该戴牛仔帽来 很好笑

translation.en: -Have a drink. I’m having another myself. -How’s the old lady?
translation.zh: 喝一杯吧 我还要再喝一杯 老夫人还好吗？

translation.en: If you’re still with her, and, uh, if she’s still with us.
translation.zh: 如果你们还没离婚的话如果…她还健在的话

translation.en: Elsa’s quite well, thank you. And yes, things are wonderful between us.
translation.zh: 艾尔莎很好 谢谢 我们感情也很好

translation.en: She’s a remarkable woman.
translation.zh: 她是个了不起的女人

translation.en: Great.
translation.zh: 那很好

translation.en: I wouldn’t be where I am now if not for Elsa.
translation.zh: 如果没有艾尔莎我不会有今日的成就

translation.en: I’m well aware of what I owe her.
translation.zh: 我知道自己欠她的

translation.en: That is not to say it isn’t also plain to me
translation.zh: 但这并不意味着超越她

translation.en: the extent to which I’ve outgrown her.
translation.zh: 对我来说是件容易的事

translation.en: It’s not her fault, of course. It’s just the path life takes.
translation.zh: 当然这不是她的错只是生活必经阶段

translation.en: She’s lent me the wings with which I now take flight.
translation.zh: 她借给我翅膀如今我已经能飞了

translation.en: -[dramatic music playing] -Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: Great things ahead. Grand adventures.
translation.zh: 前途无量 精彩的冒险

translation.en: Vast new horizons to explore.
translation.zh: 去开拓广阔的新地平线

translation.en: I could use a good soldier at my side.
translation.zh: 我需要一个好兵辅佐我

translation.en: What do you say? Like the old days?
translation.zh: 你怎么看？ 就像我们以前那样？

translation.en: Well, if I’d known the occasional mediocre fuck in a hotel
translation.zh: 要是我早知道偶尔去酒店上个床

translation.en: made me a good soldier…
translation.zh: 就能变成好兵…

translation.en: I know I’ve been out of touch for a long time and I’m sorry.
translation.zh: 我知道自己很久没有联络过你 很抱歉

translation.en: I understand how hard that must have been for you.
translation.zh: 我明白你一定很难过

translation.en: I was doing difficult and necessary work.
translation.zh: 我在忙些艰难且重要的工作

translation.en: -I couldn’t risk contacting you. -[Gordon] No.
translation.zh: -不能冒险联络你-是呀

translation.en: Of course not.
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: I warn you. Can’t be like it was before.
translation.zh: 我提醒你… 以后不会像以前一眼

translation.en: Going forward, we shall have to be rigorously discreet.
translation.zh: 以后我们必须小心谨慎

translation.en: I may have to impart some lessons in tradecraft…
translation.zh: 我可能必须传授你一些技巧

translation.en: surveillance detection, so forth.
translation.zh: 监视调查之类的

translation.en: I have more now to lose than ever.
translation.zh: 如今我要顾虑的东西更多了

translation.en: Not just Elsa. Lives all over the world could be jeopardized,
translation.zh: 如果我的声誉遭到破坏不仅是艾尔莎

translation.en: should my reputation be compromised.
translation.zh: 全世界的人可能都会受到威胁

translation.en: You know what?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: -Better not risk it then. -Wait.
translation.zh: 那你就别冒这个险了 等一下

translation.en: That old lady was right. You’re pathetic.
translation.zh: 你家老夫人说得对 你真可悲

translation.en: -[Elsa] Where have you been? -Working.
translation.zh: -你去哪了？-工作

translation.en: Hmm. Oh, yes. With one of your friends.
translation.zh: 哦 是呀 跟你那种朋友

translation.en: Shut up.
translation.zh: 闭嘴

translation.en: One of your disgusting sodomite friends.
translation.zh: 你那些令人作呕的鸡奸对象

translation.en: Shut your fucking face.
translation.zh: 你他妈给我闭嘴

translation.en: Amanda was right. I should never have let you back here.
translation.zh: 阿曼达说得对 我就不该让你回来

translation.en: Amanda? You say her name to me tonight?
translation.zh: 阿曼达？你今晚竟然还跟我提她？

translation.en: After I do her the common courtesy of inviting her here,
translation.zh: 我礼貌地邀请她来

translation.en: including her amongst the great and the powerful
translation.zh: 让她在我的庆功晚宴上与权势共餐

translation.en: on the evening of my triumph, and she has to storm out
translation.zh: 让她在我的庆功晚宴上与权势共餐 可她却连主菜都还没上就气冲冲地跑了

translation.en: sulking before the main course,
translation.zh: 可她却连主菜都还没上就气冲冲地跑了

translation.en: like the silly, spoiled American little cunt she is--
translation.zh: 她简直就是个被宠坏的愚蠢美国小婊子！

translation.en: Get out! Get out! I don’t want you here anymore.
translation.zh: 你滚！ 我不想你再留在这里

translation.en: -[Ulrich] Oh! -Get out! This is my house! I live here!
translation.zh: -你滚！-这里是我家！我住这里！

translation.en: They should have carted you off to the mausoleum years ago!
translation.zh: 你几年前就该被埋进坟墓了！

translation.en: -You stay here… -Where do you belong?
translation.zh: -你还赖在这…-你的归宿在哪里？

translation.en: …by the grace and charity of Ulrich Gero Mott,
translation.zh: …那都是我奥立克盖洛莫特的恩典

translation.en: Count Albi, Brigadier General of the Republic of Iraq!
translation.zh: 阿尔比伯爵、伊拉克共和国的准将

translation.en: Brigadier General of fucking Iraq. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 还伊拉克共和国的准将呢

translation.en: -What? -[Elsa chuckles]
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: The great brigadier general with a horseshoe up his ass!
translation.zh: 伟大的准将 靠得是运气！

translation.en: Oh, sad. You need to denigrate me to sustain yourself.
translation.zh: 真可怜 你得贬低我才能抬高自己

translation.en: Your great American rescue. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 伟大的美国救星

translation.en: That was a coincidence, wasn’t it? What a piece of luck!
translation.zh: 纯属巧合吧？ 你真是太走运了！

translation.en: You can’t stand what I’ve become.
translation.zh: 我的成就让你看不顺眼

translation.en: I’ve grown so much greater than what you imagined,
translation.zh: 我的成长已经超出你的想像

translation.en: you can’t comprehend it.
translation.zh: 你已经无法理解我

translation.en: You can’t stand that I don’t need you anymore.
translation.zh: 我不再需要你了 这令你难以忍受

translation.en: -I’ve transcended you! -Oh, bravo!
translation.zh: 我已经超越你了！ 哦 精彩！

translation.en: You can’t stand that I’m not your fucking butler anymore!
translation.zh: 我不再做你的管家你没法忍受了！

translation.en: Oh, I know you’re not my butler.
translation.zh: 哦 我知道你不是我的管家

translation.en: -You do, yeah? -You’re a fucking hotel clerk. [chuckles]
translation.zh: -是吗？-你只是个酒店小弟

translation.en: Yes, a hotel clerk in a crappy hotel.
translation.zh: 没错 而且是低级酒店的小弟

translation.en: -What? -[Elsa] Two years in a crappy motel
translation.zh: 你说什么？ 你在一家低档酒店住了两年

translation.en: with TV and breakfast and a heated pool.
translation.zh: 包电视、早餐 还有暖水池

translation.en: Yes! I looked it all up. I have your tax statements.
translation.zh: 没错！我都查过了 我有你的报税表

translation.en: All of your tax statements! [chuckles] All of them! You idiot!
translation.zh: 你的每张报税表！ 我都有！ 你这个笨蛋！

translation.en: You gave them this home address as your permanent address.
translation.zh: 你给酒店留的永久住址是这里

translation.en: You poor idiot. Working for two years in a crappy motel.
translation.zh: 可怜的笨蛋 在低级酒店干了两年

translation.en: -I don’t know what you’re talking about. -Sorry, the Villa Zarathustra.
translation.zh: 我不知道你在说什么 抱歉 查拉图斯特拉村

translation.en: Oh, the Mookie and the troops saluting. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 哦 小穆和军队向你敬礼

translation.en: You idiot! [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你这个笨蛋！

translation.en: You’re an idiot, do you hear? Idiot. Idiot! Fool!
translation.zh: 你是个笨蛋 听到了吗？笨蛋！傻子！

translation.en: [Ulrich] The men formed up and…
translation.zh: 士兵们集合起来

translation.en: paid a kind of tribute to me.
translation.zh: 向我敬礼

translation.en: He was telling me I belonged.
translation.zh: 他告诉我 我是他们的一份子

translation.en: That my efforts here have not been wasted.
translation.zh: 告诉我在这里的努力并没有白费

translation.en: That I have made a difference after all.
translation.zh: 我毕竟还是有所作为
